designernotes: 2012 Name a Personality - David Lapp. Want to play off this line from Lapp's Tourney report with regards to the art, "I don't have much of a report, main thing is that I won after finally playing sober after the cut, so that maybe says something." Lapp is a redhead (see the name), so perhaps some kind of red hair motif could be worked into the mask. I envisioned the amused, burned-out prodigy, fallen into vice and addiction, banished to the colonies. He still shows the occasional glimpses of genius when he can be roused.

designernotes: Card in memory of Shaun Patrick. his family asked for donations to animal shelter rescue projects in lieu of donations after he died, so I wanted to make a card that reflected this aspect of him. Perhaps art of a big, powerful Oni surrounded by appreciative goblins to which it has taken an affinity, an oddly cheerful scene, so that those that remember him can look at it and smile. Maybe a scene where the Oni has obviously just smashed a Crab samurai, and is happily looking on as the Goblins it protects enjoy the spoils of their victory.

Probably need to get the artist some sort of image of Jennifer in order to help out with the details. The Savior trait was something he specifically asked for in his submission, and the "Warrior of the Bright Eye" is a very important thing to people familiar with the story and history of the Naga.

Anyone who reads my work and believes a life of crime is best has missed the point. These stories are not mere entertainment. They are warnings."

title: Doji Shimada

"Still standing in my way! There is a man who wants to die!"
designernotes: Notes - Kakita Hank's brother from ALS with his beloved Katana at his side. Would be great to have the same artist who did Hank also do Dean, and have Hank in the art. Want to build these two up as brothers with a healthy rivalry.

text:

designernotes: He was stated as being someone who was journeying with Tamori Tamoko during her efforts in the Colonies.  Currently he holds a position as Scribe for the Dragon Embassy in Second City. Assisted with the investigation of a strange scream heard in the Artisan District. Chikyu has been mentioned in some of the canon fictions for the Sins of the Father storyline since then. Would like the taunt mechanics as well as setting up a "linebacker defense" via Tamori Yamabushi to kill enemy armies in Battle Resolution.   Just that Chikyu would be suited for an Honor deck that can also function well defensively.

text: Political Open: If it is another player's turn, target his unbowed Personality. Gain 1 Honor before the turn ends if the target did not attack you this turn.

text:
(Once per turn, as an Absent Engage, move your unbowed Personality in a Cavalry unit to the battle.)

designernotes: The spirit of the dead twin brother of ANO040, watching over her. He was killed in the battle where the traditionalists were betrayed, fighting at the side of the Phoenix Clan.

text:
(Draw a card after you Recruit a Destined card.)
Yuyama has +1F if you are Phoenix Clan.
title: Akodo Yuyama

flavor: With the restraints unleashed, the Lion Clan raged across the Colonies. The name "Seiken" echoed from a thousand throats.
designernotes: Hachiro astride a horse, surrounded by his few soldiers, in the mountains. His art should be consistent with his art in TCS (Mark Poole again if possible). Of particular note he carries his signature trident-like Polearm (card ANO094). He also wears the Daisho of Water, but feels unworthy to draw it.

text:
Hachiro has +2F while attacking.
Unstoppable Battle: Melee 2 Attack, or Melee 3 Attack if the target is Scorpion Clan. (Other players cannot Interrupt Unstoppable actions.)
title: Matsu Hachiro

flavor: While she is grateful for her current honor, she wishes to be on the battlefield alongside her sisters. The shameful thought presses her to perfection.

text: Battle: If Misato is opposed, target a player. He discards a card at random to draw a card. Give Misato +1F.
notes: This is a distinct card from Matsu Misato from Glory of the Empire & Ivory Edition.
title: Matsu Misato, the Hatamoto

flavor: "Where are you going? Do you not want to meet my new friend? You're being rude!"
designernotes: A Small woman Shugenja mounting a HUGE Elephant spirit riding toward us and a few frightened soldiers.

text: Interrupt: After you Recruit Yoshioka, create a 4F/2C/3PH Elephant • Nonhuman • Spirit • Cavalry Personality with the ability, "Battle: Fear 3, or Fear 4 if the target is Cavalry."
title: Kitsune Yoshioka

flavor: The Kitsune and Moshi families are very different in most ways, but in certain ways they are strikingly similar. Reverence for the natural order of things is chief among them.
designernotes: A kitsune male shugenja in the forest, surrounded by a lot of animal spirits. We should recognize as many of the already printed legal spirits as possible: the elephant in the background, a monkey in the trees, a boar, a fox …

text: After you Recruit Gorikki, if you are Crane Clan, take the Imperial Favor.
title: Kitsune Gorikki

flavor: "Carry this message for me, captain. 'We have established a perimeter around the Sea of Shadows, but all remains quiet for now. Orders?'"
designernotes: A well dressed magistrate holding some kokus, with the usual hat, talking with a merchant in a market.

text:
Courtesy: Nishigori enters play for 1 less Gold.
Once per turn, if Nishigori is unbowed, produce 3 Gold which can only pay for a single Strategy's action.
title: Yoritomo Nishigori

flavor: "Two Lion, a Crab, and a Scorpion," he whispered under his breath. "Not a bad day."
designernotes: Archer firing his arrow while running and already searching a new arrow in his quiver. Have a Wasp armband.

title: Tsuruchi Satou
flavor: "I haven't killed a Crane before. What a delightful opportunity this will be."
text: Battle, [bow]: Ranged 4 Attack (Destroy a target enemy Follower or Personality without Followers with 4 or lower Force).
designernotes: Archer firing his arrow while running and already searching a new arrow in his quiver. Have a Wasp armband.

text: Battle, :bow:: Ranged 4 Attack (Destroy a target enemy Follower or Personality without Followers with 4 or lower Force).
title: Tsuruchi Satou

flavor: Etsui's student looked up at the swirling clouds, a gleam in his unusual left eye. "This is how you stop a Mantis? Using your shugenja to summon storms? Hahahaha!"
designernotes: Bare chested Mantis in a storm on board of his boat, hair attached with a headband, laughing defiantly, looking almost mad.

title: Yoritomo Raiden
flavor: "Sail up a river during monsoon season so that you can help in the fight against the Crane? Of course, my lord Champion. I thought you wanted something difficult."
text: Unstoppable Battle: Fear 3, or Fear 4 if the target is Phoenix Clan. (Other players cannot Interrupt Unstoppable actions.)
designernotes: Bare chested Mantis in a storm on board of his boat, hair attached with a headband, laughing defiantly, looking almost mad.

text: Unstoppable Battle: Fear 3, or Fear 4 if the target is Phoenix Clan. (Other players cannot Interrupt Unstoppable actions.)
title: Yoritomo Raiden

flavor: Throughout the Colonies, the Mantis took the forefront of the progressive forces. Determined to earn their rightful place as lords of the Colonies, Hiromi's men seemed to be everywhere.
designernotes: Scout hidden/camouflaged in the Colonies jungles. Should be almost invisible :some traits visibles, and the eyes, but not much else at a first glance.

title: Yoritomo Yakuwa
flavor: He watched the Crane scouts fade in and out of the wilderness like wraiths. "This may be more of a problem than we anticipated," he muttered.
text: (Once a turn, the Attacker gets the first Battle action, if it's from a Naval Personality's unit.)
designernotes: Scout hidden/camouflaged in the Colonies jungles. Should be almost invisible :some traits visibles, and the eyes, but not much else at a first glance.

text: (Once a turn, the Attacker gets the first Battle action, if it's from a Naval Personality's unit.)
title: Yoritomo Yakuwa

flavor: "I will not see the future marred by the dangerous philosophies of Iweko Shibatsu! Iweko Seiken will sit upon the throne, or I will die in the attempt!"
designernotes: A large Isawa Shugenja hurling fireballs at his enemies.

text: Fire Interrupt: After the action resolves, if it was Fire and bowed or destroyed any enemy cards, give your target Shugenja +2F.
title: Isawa Nomura

flavor: "You may no longer be an Imperial princess, Miaka-sama, but you are a daughter of Iweko and will always have my service if you wish it."

text: Air Open, :bow:: After the next time this phase another player's action targets one of your cards, negate its (remaining) effects.
title: Isawa Tenkawa, the Scholar

flavor: "I find the sea quite calming. Strange, I know."
designernotes: A Phoenix Shugenja battling the Mantis.

text:
Ranged Attacks targeting Fujigawa have -1 strength if another player is Mantis Clan.
Courtesy: Abilities on Fujigawa's Spells have Unstoppable. (Courtesy traits do not take effect if you went first. Other players cannot Interrupt Unstoppable actions.)
title: Isawa Fujigawa

flavor: "The Empire is concerned about monstrosities born of the Sea of Shadows. There are allies to be had in such a battle." - Asako Miyabi
designernotes: Some sort of honorable Sea creature aligned with the Phoenix.

text:
Kyuji may only move to a battlefield if any enemy units are there. (Assigning isn't moving.)
Water Battle: If Kyuji has not moved to a battlefield this turn, give it +2F/-2C.
title: Kyuji

flavor: "Keep your back to me, my lady," Koshiba cautioned. "These Unicorn are devious foes."
designernotes: A Shiba Yojimbo working with the Lion (see in particular #37).

text: Unstoppable Battle: Give a target enemy Follower or Personality -1F, or -3F if you control a Lion Clan Personality or your Stronghold's Gold Production is 3. (Other players cannot Interrupt Unstoppable actions.)
title: Shiba Koshiba

flavor: "Regardless of what happens to me, I shall live forever through my actions."
designernotes: A young Shiba Yojimbo with a scarred face.

text: (Draw a card after you Recruit a Destined card. Duelists win tied duels versus non-Duelists.)
story: Ever optimistic, ever loved, never forgotten - Joshua Davis
title: Shiba Kintaro, the Remembered

flavor: Sometimes love and duty coincide.
designernotes: [Note: BF/GF Costume Contest winners from Poland.]

text:
This counts as two cards when destroyed during battle resolution.
Tireless Open: If you have targeted Aggushi & Janqu with a Political action this turn, straighten them.
Battle, :bow:: Melee 3 Attack.
story: 2013 Euros Costume Contest Winners - Agnieszka Stasiowska & Marcin Janoszek
title: Bayushi Aggushi & Bayushi Janqu

flavor: "If Sihung couldn't kill me, no Lion will!"
designernotes: [Note: Experienced Irezu leading the Scorpion to fight the Lion]

text:
Irezu has +1C if another player is Lion Clan.
Battle: Move home a target unit whose total Force is less than or equal to Irezu's Chi.
title: Bayushi Irezu

flavor: Despite her lord's reservations, Tenzan's wife was allowed to join him on his seemingly hopeless quest.

text:
Iyashi has Courtier while you control The Sorrow.
Battle, :bow:: Melee 2 Attack, or Melee 4 Attack if you control The Sorrow or the target is Shadowlands.
title: Bayushi Iyashi, Lady Sorrow

flavor: "His mask is imposing, but the man himself seems meek. It's all very confusing. What is he really?" - Kaiu Akemi
designernotes: [Note: Shosuro Yamazaki from LL]

text:
Interrupt: After you Recruit Yamazaki, show a random card in another player's hand.
Political Open, :bow:: Rehonor and bow a target dishonorable Personality.
title: Shosuro Yamazaki, the Master Courtier

flavor: "The Scorpion need power, regardless of the source. And we know how to handle such things."
designernotes: [Note: A Yogo Shugenja who dabbles in Blood Magic for the great good, because, y'know, he can control this.]

text:
After a dishonorable Personality is destroyed, his controller loses 1 Honor.
:bow:: Produce Gold equal to Chijin's Chi which can only pay for a single Air or Maho Spell.
title: Yogo Chijin

flavor: "The Hiruma have learned many things from us. I wonder what we will learn from the Hida?" - Bayushi Nitoshi
designernotes: [Note: A Scorpion Samurai working along side a Crab ally. Art should tie in with Hiruma Rugen from this set.]

text:
Courtesy: Gorobei has Conqueror. (Courtesy traits do not take effect if you went first.)
Gorobei has +1F while in an army with a Crab Clan Personality.
title: Yogo Gorobei

flavor: "Oh, to the contrary, I am very interested in maintaining order, Hida-san. You might even say I am willing to go to great lengths for it."
designernotes: A steel-eyed Spider Clan Obsidian Magistrate. Winter Court 3 Character.

text:
(Duelists win tied duels versus non-Duelists.)
Unstoppable Battle: Fear 3, or Fear 4 if Takahide has won a duel this turn. (Other players cannot Interrupt Unstoppable actions.)
title: Daigotsu Takahide

flavor: "I have enjoyed far more freedom as a Gyushi than I ever did among the Chuda!"
designernotes: A simply-dressed shugenja crafting a sinister weapon using fire magic and smithing tools.

text: Fire Open, :g3:: Create a +2F/+1C One-Handed • Sword • Weapon Item and attach it to your target Personality.
title: Gyushi Kageto

flavor: "The Empire has forgotten us, master. They will be reminded soon enough."
designernotes: A muscled and sinister monk seen from behind, sitting in a lotus position in a dark cave on top of a pile of broken and mangled people, meditating. Various mad musings are scrawled onto the walls of the cavern with the blood of the dead. Blood can be seen on his hands and fingers.

text: (Draw a card after you Recruit a Destined card. Kensai may attach two Weapons, as long as neither is Two-Handed.)
formattedtitle: Kokujin Dairu, Student of the Dark Lotus
title: Kokujin Dairu, Student of the Dark Lotus

flavor: "It is done," whispered Dairu. Fire danced in his eyes.
designernotes: A Spider Monk receiving a tattoo of a setting sun on her back from a Togashi tattoo artist. Either secretly or otherwise, this Monk is a follower of Kokujin's teachings.

text: Tireless Battle: Bow your target unbowed Dragon Clan or Monk Personality to straighten Kuchika. You may destroy the target to give Kuchika +2F and permanently give her Tattooed.
formattedtitle: Kokujin Kuchika, Blood of the Dark Lotus
title: Kokujin Kuchika, Blood of the Dark Lotus

flavor: "Perhaps your school is older, my friend, but I've danced the courtly dance while you were still crawling."
designernotes: A charming and smiling Susumu courtier.

text:
Courtesy: You have a +5 Lobby Bonus. (Courtesy traits do not take effect if you went first.)
Interrupt: After you Recruit Issei, put a Political Battle Strategy from your discard pile into your hand.
title: Susumu Issei

flavor: "It seems these coins are counterfeit. How unfortunate for the Crab." Kengo grinned.
designernotes: A Susumu politician messing with the Crab's money on orders from Kuroko.

text:
(Draw a card after your Expendable card dies.)
Kengo has +1PH (in and out of play) if another player is Crab Clan.
title: Susumu Kengo

flavor: "My name? It no longer matters. Only the Void matters. Only the secrets."
designernotes: A Void Shugenja who was kicked out of the Phoenix Clan for reasons we are unaware of.

text:
(Once per game per card, a Resilient card does not die in battle resolution. Shugenja may attach and cast Spells.)
Will not gain the "Phoenix Clan" Clan Alignment.
title: Banished

flavor: "Still run-running, manling, and young-young now, if Tomorrow try to catch again."
designernotes: Notes - Can become a 4F for 5 with some investment and 5 via miracle.  The Ashalan thing is mostly flavour as there is only one card in the arc that is Ashalan, that being Ashalan Ambush, a Strat from GoC. This one's for Braun.

text: Br'nn has +1F while he has an attachment. Br'nn has +1F while an attachment is in another player's discard pile. Br'nn has +1F while another player controls an Ashalan card.
title: Br'nn

flavor: Imperial heirs marry for duty, but she dares hope she might also marry for love.

text:
Will not gain a Clan Alignment. After your turn begins, if you control six other Love Letter cards with different titles and six Affection tokens, you win the game.
Favor Political Open, :bow:: Discard the Imperial Favor to draw a card.
title: Iweko Miaka, the Princess

flavor: "Serve Spider? No. That father, not me."
designernotes: Notes - As Kayomasa grew old, he did not forget the oath he swore to Daigotsu.  Now, his sons have taken up the mantle and will protect Kanpeki or his progeny if they are called upon.

text:
After Masajiro enters play, lose 2 Honor.
Home Battle: If he would be opposed, move Masajiro to the current battlefield. After he moves, straighten his attachments if there is another Nonhuman or Unique Personality in his army.
title: Masajiro

designernotes: Notes - He likes to steal things. A Goblin in a cave hording items.

text:
After Keppo enters play, lose 3 Honor.
Interrupt, [*]: If the action Recruits Keppo or is his printed Battle action, after it resolves, Equip a target attachment from another player's discard pile to him.
Battle: Destroy a target enemy attachment with 4 Gold Cost or less.
story: 2013 A Hero for the Ages - Anthony Lawrence
title: Keppo

flavor: "Retired? Hardly. Just a new market to work for recruits."
designernotes: Notes - A way for the Kobi Sensei to actually have a bit more teeth. Try to stay true to what Jinn-Kuen has always been.

text:
Other players' actions targeting The Abbot cost 2 more Gold (even actions without Gold costs).
Invest :g1:: Gain a Conspiracy Token. You may give a target card you do not control a Clout Token.
Kolat Political Open: Straighten a target Holding.
title: The Abbot

flavor: "Some consider my victory unusual, but then these are unusual times."
designernotes: A weathered, well-traveled Unicorn trader leading a large and prosperous trading caravan.

text:
Hideshi's Invest is :g0: if another player is Phoenix Clan.
Invest :g2:: Permanently give another player's target Holding the trait, "After this Holding bows, each player gains 1 Honor."
title: Ide Hideshi, Topaz Champion

flavor: "If only you could hear my words from the lips of Lady Naleesh. She believes strongly in the cause, as I do."
designernotes: A sly Unicorn politician gladhanding through courts.

text: Courtesy: Igo has Destined. (Courtesy traits do not take effect if you went first. Draw a card after you Recruit a Destined card.)
title: Ide Igo

flavor: She walked through the battlefield, her footsteps falling just shy of the ground. She whispered the names of the fallen and felt the echoes in her soul.
designernotes: A Death Priest spinning on a battlefield, at the center of a field of fallen Phoenix and Unicorn Samurai, drawing power from their deaths.

text: Interrupt, :bow:: After the action resolves, if its Fear effects bowed any cards without attachments, destroy them.
title: Moto Nergui

flavor: "Death holds no power when you give it no hold within your soul."
designernotes: A large, imposing, thick bearded Moto commander leading armies to battle against the Phoenix Clan. He is a zealot to the Lords of Death.

text:
Tadasu has +1F while you control a Death Priest.
Unstoppable Battle: Fear 3 that may target Spells. Destroy any Spells this bowed. (Spells have 0 Force.)
title: Moto Tadasu

flavor: "You may not want to hear my words, Tadasu-san, but you must heed them if you wish to bring victory to our clan."
designernotes: A grim, powerfully built Moto Death priest with an intimidating glare. He is the Hatamoto and personal advisor to [Moto Magic Masher] (ANO074).

text: (A Conqueror's unit doesn't bow after battle. Shugenja may attach and cast Spells.)
title: Moto Chizura

flavor: "Haha!" she shouted in pure glee. She knew death lurked inches from her in every direction, but in her heart of hearts she knew she would not die this day.
designernotes: A brave and headstrong young female Shinjo magistrate breaking through a group of bandits, riding one down, accompanied by a ronin partner (ANO079).

text:
Saeki has +1F while in an army with any Ronin.
Battle: Give a target enemy Personality -2F. If he has lower Personal Honor, give Saeki +1F.
title: Shinjo Saeki

flavor: "As for myself, I care little who sits on the throne. I am but a soldier, and I will never be in his presence. I wage war on the Shadowlands, and that is all."

text: Battle, :bow:: Reduce a target enemy Follower or Personality's Force by Taisho's Force.
title: Hida Taisho

flavor: "You have served well despite your curse, brother. I swear to you, and to our parents in the next world, I will find a way to end your life. Trust me, Kaiji."
designernotes: Art: A wounded, blood covered Berserker posing in the remains of a battlefield. Despite his injuries he still looks ready to fight again.

text:
(A Conqueror's unit doesn't bow after battle.)
Battle: Fear equal to Zaiburo's Force minus 1.
title: Hida Zaiburo

flavor: "The Kokujin monks have returned, Shara-sensei. I swear to you, I will end them."
designernotes: Art: A female Crab samurai with blue facepaint readying herself for battle. The strange claw/axe weapon from Hida Shara's art is hanging on the wall of the room in a place of honor.

text:
(Once per game per card, a Resilient card does not die in battle resolution.)
Engage: If Raikohime is opposed, discard a card to make the enemy leader either discard a Battle Strategy, or show you his hand if it does not have one.
title: Hiruma Raikohime

flavor: He inspected every single seam, spending hours upon hours supervising the work. The Kaiu were not known for their expertise without just cause.
designernotes: Art: A buff Samurai examining the craftsmanship of a stone wall as some younger looking Kaiu look on, waiting for his verdict.

text: Before you Proclaim Burei, increase the Honor gain to equal the number of your Fortifications in play, up to 5.
title: Kaiu Burei

flavor: "What simpleton drew up these plans? Look at these oversights. I could capture this fortification with a dozen men. No, this will not do at all."
designernotes: Art: A female Kaiu general with a ton of architectural plans and maps spread across her room and desk. She seems to be analyzing them, trying to determine a plan of attack.

text: Battle, :bow:: If Daikohime is defending, Ranged 3 Attack. After this destroys a card, gain 1 Honor.
title: Kaiu Daikohime

flavor: "The construction seems to be ahead of schedule. I think the new Emperor will be very pleased."
designernotes: Art: An older Watsuki looking to a large castle structure in the distance, a smug look of satisfaction on his face. The building in the background is a much larger and more complex version of the castle in his original art, Watsuki having improved it significantly in the previous years.

text:
Interrupt: After the action Recruits a Fortification from a Province, refill it face-up.
Battle: Ranged 3 Attack with +1 strength for each Fortification at this battlefield.
title: Kaiu Watsuki

flavor: He felt the spirits of the earth stirring all around him, taking notice of his deference and patience. Like the Crab, the Earth despised weakness and impatience. The priest smiled. "Thank you, my friends," he said softly.
designernotes: Art: A Kuni shugenja (not Witch Hunter) meditating in a calm manner, while evil, menacing looking spirits float around him.

text: (Shugenja may attach and cast Spells.)
title: Kuni Chutsu

flavor: The witch-hunter's make-up gleamed in the moonlight. "Tell me, friend Phoenix… where did you find these scrolls?"
designernotes: Art: A Kuni in full Witch Hunter costume (face paint, etc.) openly accusing a sheepish Phoenix Shugenja of something in a court setting.

text: Earth Battle, :bow:: Melee 3 Attack, or Melee 4 Attack if the target is Shadowlands (Destroy a target enemy Follower or Personality without Followers with Force equal to or lower than the Melee Attack's strength).
title: Kuni Harakibi

flavor: Since his return from the Colonies, many have noted that Renyu's temper has only worsened.
designernotes: Art: Renyu angrily ranting (probably about the Colonies), as his brother Kisada looks on from the background with concern.

text:
Earth Interrupt: If the action is Earth, negate the next straightening (this turn) of each card it bows.
Earth Unstoppable Battle: Bow a target enemy card that is Dragon Clan, Gaijin, Shadowlands, or has no attachments.
title: Kuni Renyu

flavor: "Celebration is never an excuse to allow our vigilance to waver. We must be strong because so many others are weak."

text:
(Shugenja may attach and cast Spells.)
Earth Battle, :g*:: Equip a target Follower in your hand to your target Personality.
title: Kuni Yairao

flavor: Whispering a prayer, the priest took the paper from the dead soldier's hand. "The Empire must hear this death poem," he whispered.

text:
(Shugenja may attach and cast Spells.)
Open: Target another player's Personality. After the next time this turn he is destroyed during a battle, gain 2 Honor.
title: Asahina Hirakane

flavor: "To kill the spirit is the swiftest victory of all."
designernotes: A badass Daidoji in full blue armor, with weapons strapped to his back (a bow, probably) on top of his wakizashi and katana, jumping into battle.

text:
Hiroteru has +1F for each bowed card in the enemy army.
Battle: Fear 3.
title: Daidoji Hiroteru

flavor:
The sensei asked, "Is it better to live well, or to die well?"
Taenaru did not flinch. "Both," she replied.

title: Daidoji Taenaru
flavor: "The Tsuruchi move through the wilderness like ghosts. How are we supposed to find them?"
text:
Reaction: After Tae is destroyed: Gain 2 Honor.
Battle: Once per battle, target an enemy Personality with lower Force than his own base Force: Move him home; if he moved, bow him.

After Taenaru is destroyed, gain 2 Honor.
Battle: Once per battle, move home a target enemy Personality with lower current Force than his own printed Force. Bow him as he moves.
title: Daidoji Taenaru

flavor: "Perhaps it is an unlucky name," he admitted. He smiled. "Unlucky for you."

text:
(Draw a card after your Expendable card dies.)
Interrupt: After Masachika enters play, dishonor a target Personality with equal or lower Personal Honor.
title: Doji Masachika

flavor: "You harbor a criminal in your army, Matsu-san. Were you aware of this?"

text: Absent Home Battle: Move Norime into your defending army. After this moves her, you may target and bow an enemy dishonorable Personality. (Absent actions may be taken without presence. Home actions may be taken from home.)
title: Doji Norime

flavor: "A wise lord would never risk fielding a disgraced man, even if that man was a master swordsman. It makes his enemy look virtuous. The battle is but a moment in time; the aftermath is an eternity. How easily victory sours, like spoiled milk."

text: Political Engage: If Senkiku opposes a dishonorable Personality, gain 2 Honor.
title: Doji Senkiku

flavor: "Who wrote this!?" the man demanded, the scroll clenched in his fist. His eyes raked the court. "Who is this 'Waratte?'" The daimyo looked away, and too late the man realized he'd been made a fool.

text: Political Interrupt: Before another player loses Honor from the action, Tashihime's poems immortalize the shame; increase the loss by 1 and gain 1 Honor.
title: Doji Tashihime

flavor: "A man to be admired! Truly, this is the most glorious celebration Susumu-sama could have conceived without opening his coffers!"
designernotes: A grinning Crane with painted, whited face and white hair, gesticulating, surrounded by a laughing crowd, to the exception of a lonely Spider.

text: Political Interrupt, :bow:: If the action is yours, before you gain Honor from it, negate the gain to make a target player lose 1 Honor.
title: Kakita Akitomo

flavor: The Kakita Jester is a master entertainer. The ideal jester can dance, sing, compose spontaneous poetry, and amuse an audience without appearing like a buffoon. However, with all these talents, they are best known for their barbed wit.
designernotes: A male young Crane with white painted face, dancing in traditional japanese manner (look like he's stumbling) , with a fan in hand. Long black hair, flowing kimono.

text:
(Draw a card after your Expendable card dies.)
After you Proclaim Hikai or he is destroyed, a target player loses 1 Honor.
title: Kakita Hikai

flavor: "Such a charming, peaceful soul. But his music is so anguished…" - Doji Makoto
designernotes: A calm Courtier, with an intense stare. Have his family swords at his hip, chained, to make sure he won't use them.

text:
Ikura will not attack or issue challenges, and cannot be challenged from Iaijutsu actions.
Favor Political Open: Discard the Imperial Favor to make a target player lose 1 Honor.
title: Kakita Ikura

flavor: "A man whose sword is always drawn is never approached. He has no allies. Yet a man who never draws his sword will find it rusting in its sheath. Seek balance in all things." - The Tao of Shinsei

text:
(Duelists win tied duels versus non-Duelists.)
Mitsumichi will not refuse challenges. If Mitsumichi is honorable, the first card another player focuses in each duel against him is focused face-up.
title: Kakita Mitsumichi

flavor: "The door was open," the dying Bayushi remarked. Ujirou shrugged and wiped blood from his blade.
designernotes: Kakita Ujirou, with his iconic mask, bursting through a wall (or at least bursting through something).

text:
After Ujirou enters play, you may take an additional action. While you are the Defender, you Recruit Ujirou for 5 less Gold.
Battle: Fear 4 that destroys attachments and dishonorable Personalities after it bows them.
title: Kakita Ujirou

flavor: "Here, master," the student remarked. "This mark was placed to confuse us."
designernotes: A bright young Kitsuki magistrate contemplating a bloodstain. 081's partner.

text:
(Draw a card after your Expendable card dies.)
Courtesy: Einosuke has Destined. (Courtesy traits do not take effect if you went first. Draw a card after you Recruit a Destined card.)
title: Kitsuki Einosuke

flavor: "We were once allies with your kind, Scorpion," he said. "But that time has passed. Why would we support your foolish war?"

text: Battle: Move home a target Human Personality with the lowest Personal Honor at this battlefield (you choose in case of a tie).
title: Kitsuki Goichi

flavor: Masamitsu's talents help train the next generation as well as lead to testimony that traps the guilty.
designernotes: A confident, older Kitsuki magistrate examining murder evidence. Partner of 080.

text:
(Shugenja may attach and cast Spells.)
Air Tireless Open: If Masamitsu has cast an Air Spell this turn, straighten him. (Tireless actions may be taken even while bowed.)
title: Kitsuki Masamitsu

flavor: "The first child or the second? An interesting, but useless question. It was never for us to choose who might be Emperor, only to wait until the great cycle reveals itself."

text: Tireless Battle: Target your Ring. You may bow it to straighten Akifumi or you may bow Akifumi to straighten it. (Tireless actions may be taken even while bowed.)
title: Mirumoto Akifumi

flavor: "Matters with the Spider grow even more strained than before with the appointment of this new Emperor. They are an interesting people, and I would be saddened to cut them down. Saddened, but not worried."
"Peace in the Colonies, my friend. The Dragon will brook no more of this pointless conflict."

text: Iaijutsu Battle, :bow:: Move home a target enemy defending Personality with equal or lower Chi. Straighten Rikiya if he won a duel this turn.
title: Mirumoto Rikiya

flavor: "The mad ones. The Fudoists. Bandits. Criminals. Many faces of the same foe, undone by the same weapon - justice."
designernotes: Experienced Mirumoto Tsuda, the recently crowned Emerald Champion.

text: Iaijutsu Battle: Challenge a target enemy Personality. If the target is honorable, his controller may dishonor him and move him home to refuse the duel. Destroy the loser.
title: Mirumoto Tsuda, Emerald Champion

flavor: Seiken burst from the ground itself, propelled by his steed of stone. The Scorpion ambush was scattered, and the Dragon made their presence known.
designernotes: Tamori Seiken on a great war horse made of stone, bursting from the ground in the middle of a mass of troops, sending them flying in all directions.

text:
Seiken's Nonhuman Followers have Cavalry.
Earth Battle: Fear equal to the Focus Value of Seiken's target Follower or Spell.
title: Tamori Seiken

flavor: "Hello, my enemies. I have a gift for you. Where shall I place it?"
designernotes: A shugenja using magic to rip stone from a mountainside and form it into rock troops.

text:
(Shugenja may attach and cast Spells.)
Earth Battle: Give a target enemy Follower or Personality -2F.
title: Tamori Shoko

flavor: "A new Emperor sits on the Throne, and yet I know there will be little true rejoicing. Times like these make opportunists out of many souls."
designernotes: A burly, muscular shugenja with rocks swirling around his arms and energy coming from his eyes.

text: (A Conqueror's unit doesn't bow after battle. Shugenja may attach and cast Spells.)
title: Tamori Tsunemi

flavor: The ise zumi in the Colonies have taken great strides to bring harmony to the region.
designernotes: A Monk completely in tuned with the Elements.

text: Taiki has the element keywords of any Rings you control. While you control a Ring of Air, he has Cavalry; Ring of Earth, he has +2F/+1C; Ring of Fire, he has, "Battle: Melee 2 Attack."; Ring of Water, he has Conqueror; Ring of Void, he has Destined • Expendable.
title: Togashi Taiki

flavor: Second generation Deathseekers are virtually unheard of, but then again, the unheard grows increasingly common.

text: Battle: Fear equal to Eirasu's Force that bows any Undead card it targets. (Target an enemy Follower or Personality without Followers; bow it if its Force is less than or equal to the Fear's strength.)
title: Akodo Eirasu

flavor: The insults suffered due to the offenses of the Scorpion would not be borne lightly by the Lion. The sons of Akodo and daughters of Matsu were not those who endured such things without answer.

text: Battle, :g2:: Discard a card to create a 2F Cat • Nonhuman Follower and attach it to your target Beastmaster.
title: Akodo Hio

flavor: "You served the Empress with honor, father. I shall serve her son in the same fashion."
designernotes: Akodo Kenaro reverentlly prays to the shrine of his ancestors and offers them his sword for their blessing.

text:
After your Personality wins a duel at a battlefield, give him +1F.
Iaijutsu Battle: Kenaro challenges a target enemy Personality. Bow the loser.
title: Akodo Kenaro

flavor: "Not all of us are called to serve in the same manner. I would gladly carry a blade into battle for my lord, but my duty is to govern, and I will do it with all that I have."

text: Your Bushido Virtue Strategies in and out of play have +1FV, to a maximum of 4.
title: Akodo Naikiru

flavor: There are few families in Rokugan who place as great an emphasis on education as the Akodo. The overwhelming emphasis is on warfare, of course, but other subjects are covered as well.
designernotes: A young Akodo being taught the ways of the sword.

text:
(Duelists win tied duels versus non-Duelists.)
Shaido has +1F and +1PH while attacking.
title: Akodo Shaido

flavor: His face registered disappointment as he sheathed his blade. Yet another opponent had failed to give him challenge.
designernotes: A Lion samurai turning from an opponent and sheathing his sword after beating him with a surgical strike, while in the background the Lion armies are destroying the enemy's forces. Akodo Toturi Homage.

text:
(Duelists win tied duels versus non-Duelists.)
Invest :g2:: Put an Iaijutsu Strategy in your discard pile into your hand. (Entering play, permanently increase the Gold Cost by the Invest cost to get the effect.)
title: Akodo Taiketsu

flavor: His uncle bore the blessings of Bishamon himself, the Fortune of Strength. Some say he possesses it as well.

text:
(Battle: Discard a card to give this Tactician a Force bonus equal to the card's Focus Value.)
Political Interrupt: Before you gain Honor from a Battle action, negate the gain to draw a card.
title: Ikoma Noritsu

flavor: As the Lion pushed farther into Scorpion territory, many strange things were discovered. "What are you doing here, cousin?" he asked the large cat, but of course it did not answer.
"It is said her mother is Matsu Benika, bearer of the Jade Hand. I do not know if this is true, but she possesses insight such as no warrior I have ever known." - Akodo Kano
designernotes: A young woman regarding a sliver of jade she wears around her neck, surrounded by her tamed Lions.

text: Battle: Fear 2, or Fear 4 if Ataruko has a Nonhuman, non-Shadowlands Follower.
title: Matsu Ataruko

flavor: "She speaks to cats in a manner I cannot understand. Never ask after her father." - Akodo Dairuko
designernotes: A young, wild female samurai running with a pack of lions.

text:
Melee Attacks and Fear effects from Cat Followers in this army have +1 strength.
Interrupt: After Chizuki enters play, search your Fate deck for Zaiko, show it, and put it in your hand.
title: Matsu Chizuki

flavor: "She carries an unconventional weapon, but it is one that the Scorpion have learned to fear. Many of their kinsmen's blood is upon it." - Ikoma Sairei

text: Interrupt: Negate Iairimi's movement from the action.
title: Matsu Iairimi

flavor: "You will be my chief implement of vengeance upon these filthy Scorpion," Chizuki said with a smile. "Teach them what it means to cross the Matsu."
designernotes: A brave and noble Lion Samurai-ko. Art homage to Matsu Tsuko.

text: Battle, :bow:: Melee 3 Attack. Straighten Karoko if she is attacking.
title: Matsu Karoko

flavor: "By the Fortunes, he's a fast one! How does he keep up with the beasts?" - Ikoma Noritsu
designernotes: A samurai riding into battle on a Lion.

text:
(Once per turn, as an Absent Engage, move your unbowed Personality in a Cavalry unit to the battle.)
Keiasu's Nonhuman, non-Shadowlands Followers have Cavalry.
title: Matsu Keiasu

flavor: "My ancestor was called the Golden Crane for his skill in dueling. I venerate his memory, but call me a Crane and we shall cross steel."
designernotes: A female samurai with a scar on her face. Her armor should be an homage to Matsu Seijuro, with his mask being worn on her hip or shoulder.

text:
(Duelists win tied duels versus non-Duelists.)
After Seijuko wins a duel, give her +1PH.
Battle: Fear equal to Seijuko's Personal Honor.
title: Matsu Seijuko

flavor: "Regardless of the new Emperor's preferences, I will not see the Moshi lose their way."
designernotes: A traditionally, well dressed Moshi, tied hairs, white face. She's surrounded by fire magic. Look very stern.

text:
Your other Moshi Personalities in Ikako's army have +1F. After Ikako enters play, you may take an additional action.
Fire Battle: Ranged Attack equal to 2 plus the number of other Personalities in this army.
title: Moshi Ikako

flavor: "My mother earned great glory for the Mantis in battle against the Destroyers. I seek only to serve in a similar manner. How can a simple priestess cause an Empire to take note?"

text: (Shugenja may attach and cast Spells.)
title: Moshi Karuiko

flavor: It is said that her grandmother was born of the Daidoji, and it is in her memory that she wears such an odd helm.

text: Battle, :bow:: Ranged 4 Attack. Bow the target if it is still in play.
title: Tsuruchi Arayo

flavor: "I enjoyed killing the Crane, but I think I would like to try a different prey."

title: Tsuruchi Jinrai
flavor: He sprang from the battlements, firing arrow after arrow without ceasing. Each one found their mark perfectly.
text: Battle: Bow Jougo: Ranged 3 Attack. You may then target a Mantis Clan Personality in one of your provinces. Reduce his Gold cost by 2, to a minimum of 3, until it is paid or the turn ends.
Battle, :bow:: Ranged 3 Attack. You may target a Mantis Clan Personality in one of your Provinces and reduce his Gold Cost by 2 (this turn), to a minimum of 3.
title: Tsuruchi Jinrai

flavor: "Brother, no one wants to hear about your armor. Fight and be done with it!"
designernotes: A nunchaku wieilding Yoritomo in a melee in the Second city streets, beating on thugs.

text:
(Kensai may attach two One-Handed Weapons. Once a turn, the Attacker gets the first Battle action, if it's from a Naval Personality's unit.)
Battle: Give a target enemy Personality -2F, or -3F if Juriken has a Gaijin or Peasant Weapon attached.
title: Yoritomo Juriken

flavor: "Is it not glorious? For every man I slay, I take a single coin and add its metal to my armor. Gaze upon my kills."

text:
(Once a turn, the Attacker gets the first Battle action, if it's from a Naval Personality's unit.)
While opposed, Kuniken has +1F for each of your Port Holdings, up to three Ports.
title: Yoritomo Kuniken

flavor: "In any other clan he would have been discarded, cast out. Only in the Mantis has he found his true worth." - Yoritomo Hiromi
designernotes: Seppun Matsuo in full armor, at the head of a ship, kama visible at his side.

text:
Equipping Weapons is Battle/Open for you.
Battle: Bow your target unbowed Weapon, then straighten it if it is Gaijin or Peasant. Destroy a target enemy attachment.
title: Yoritomo Matsuo

flavor: Throughout Rokugan, no other clan looks forward to the changes a new Emperor brings to the tax structure of the Empire. Perhaps because, as so many say, no clan loves coin as do the Mantis.
designernotes: A mid age Mantis samurai, long wild hair tied in a knot, kokus are visible in the art. ton of them.

text: Economic Home Interrupt, :g2:: Give the action's Ranged Attacks +2 or -2 strength.
title: Yoritomo Minoro

flavor: The students of the half-Naga Yoritomo Minori are a strange and private group.
designernotes: A Samurai ko in full armor with her cask on, wielding a pair of kama. Think a female version of the first yoritomo art.

text:
(Kensai may attach two One-Handed Weapons.)
Battle: Fear 2, with +2 strength if Nintai has a Gaijin or Peasant Weapon attached, and with +1 strength if her army has fewer units than the enemy army.
title: Yoritomo Nintai

flavor: "The name of the man who sits upon the throne is of little concern to me, so long as I may remain upon the sea."
designernotes: A young Samurai-ko in green mantis garb, lightly clothed since she's on a ship, but still nothing too sexy. She have a pair of tonfas.

text: (Kensai may attach two One-Handed Weapons. Once a turn, the Attacker gets the first Battle action, if it's from a Naval Personality's unit.)
title: Yoritomo Saitsuko

flavor: "A new Emperor means a new age, and this shall be an age in which the Mantis shall forever be remembered!"

text: (Once a turn, the Attacker gets the first Battle action, if it's from a Naval Personality's unit.)
title: Yoritomo Tsuhime

flavor: The merchant placed the coins in the samurai's hand, but to his dismay, the Mantis only smiled and held his hand out for more.

text: Interrupt: If the action is a Ranged Attack action, after it resolves, give your target Personality +2F.
title: Yoritomo Waito

flavor: "Only once has an Agasha sat upon the Council of Five. If it takes me a hundred reincarnations, I will be the next!"

text: (Shugenja may attach and cast Spells.)
title: Agasha Shikeno

flavor: "Are the Unicorn truly surprised that their repulsive ancestry may have stained their souls? If so, they are more naÃ¯ve than I imagined."

text:
(Shugenja may attach and cast Spells.)
Water Interrupt: After the action Equips a Spell to Tameko, take an additional action.
title: Agasha Tameko

flavor: "To accept the taint in this age is to reject the protection of the Divine Emperor. Before, I might have felt pity. Not anymore."
designernotes: A blind phoenix shugenja with eye tattoos on his palms is interrogating a restrained shugenja.

text: Earth Open: Target a Personality. You suspect him of the taint. If he has Shadowlands, give him -2F. He has Shadowlands while you are taking actions (this turn).
title: Asako Hiribe

flavor: The elder Asako Daimyo leads the family with militant sternness, quite unlike the many Asako Henshin daimyo before her.
designernotes: A stern inquisitor surrounded by a posse of lesser magistrates and inquisitors.

text: Earth Battle: Bow a target enemy Personality. If he is Shadowlands, give each Shugenja in this army +1F.
title: Asako Tsunefusa

flavor: The mourning at funerals must remain silent and still, lest the spirit remain in the realm of the living. Only the dancing shugenja may show emotion.
designernotes: A shugenja dancing in the air.

text: Air Open, :bow:: Target a Phoenix Clan Personality in your discard pile. The rebirth begins. He becomes honorably dead.
title: Isawa Akime

flavor: "If I never have to use my gifts, I will consider both myself and the Empire so very lucky."

text: Earth Battle, :bow:: You may bow one of Haruge's Spells to straighten her. Bow a target enemy Personality. If it is an Oni, it will not straighten until the next turn ends.
title: Isawa Haruge

flavor: "If a prophecy is unavoidable, what does that imply about our ability to choose our actions?"

text: (Loyal Personalities will not join other Clans. Once a turn, the Attacker gets the first Battle action, if it's from a Naval Personality's unit. Shugenja may attach and cast Spells.)
title: Isawa Kageharu

flavor: "Water that remains still for too long soon stagnates."

text:
(Once per turn, as an Absent Engage, move your unbowed Personality in a Cavalry unit to the battle.)
Water Battle: If he would be opposed, move your target Personality at any location to a battlefield (not necessarily this one).
title: Isawa Mochiko

flavor: "Even war is sacred, if it is conducted as such."
designernotes: Isawa Uzuyumi looms over a battlefield standing on top of a giant wave of water, directing it with a fan.

text: Water Battle: If he would be opposed, move to this battlefield a target Personality at any location. Straighten his unit as he moves.
title: Isawa Uzuyumi

flavor: "To live for others is the most sacred duty, second only to dying for others."

text: Battle, :bow:: Ranged Attack equal to Danjiro's Force.
title: Shiba Danjiro

flavor: "Stay close to me, and I will carve us a path to the general's heart!"

text:
(Duelists win tied duels versus non-Duelists.)
After the first time each turn Kiyomichi assigns to an army with a Shugenja, gain 1 Honor.
Battle: Move your target Shugenja at any location to Kiyomichi's battlefield.
title: Shiba Kiyomichi

flavor: "My friend… do you really want to do that?"

text:
Political Interrupt: If the action targets Junko and is another player's, he may choose to lose 2 Honor. If he did not choose this, negate the action.
Tireless Battle: Move Junko home.
title: Bayushi Junko

flavor: "Yes, yes, the Lion. They continue to think that they can wage war on the Scorpion without repercussions. I continue to think otherwise."

text: Political Interrupt: After Katsue enters play, a target player loses 1 Honor.
title: Bayushi Katsue

flavor: "Sages say that there is a time under the Heavens to pick up a sword and a time to put down a sword. I say there is also a time to pick up two swords."
designernotes: Art Notes - A crazed Scorpion Samurai fighting with two swords, shaking the resolve of his enemies.

text: (Kensai may attach two One-Handed Weapons.)
title: Bayushi Manora

flavor: "It is not enough to have one sword. I would carry swords with my feet if I could still walk."
designernotes: Art Notes - A Scorpion disarming their enemy with one weapon while preparing to strike with the other.

text:
(Kensai may attach two One-Handed Weapons.)
Battle, :bow:: Fear 4. You may bow Saikaku's Weapon or destroy a Madness token on him to straighten him.
title: Bayushi Saikaku

flavor: "The Lion are coming. I am ready to greet them."

text:
Sunetsu's Items must be Armor or Weapons.
Battle: If Sunetsu has one or no Followers, move her to an unresolved battlefield.
title: Bayushi Sunetsu

flavor: "I remember when the Crab were enemies, but now we fight back-to-back. If I am mad, it is because the world is mad."
designernotes: An older, tired Toshimo thoughtfully regards his battered koku coin as he prepares for battle.

text: Battle: Fear equal to the Force of your target unbowed Kensai. You may destroy a Madness token on Toshimo to have this destroy cards after it bows them.
title: Bayushi Toshimo

flavor: "Face me."

text:
(Duelists win tied duels versus non-Duelists.)
Longji's Followers must be Ninja. Personalities cannot refuse a challenge from Longji unless they bow first. Your actions targeting Longji that create challenges are Unstoppable. (Other players cannot Interrupt Unstoppable actions.)
title: Shosuro Longji

flavor: "A Lion samurai clings to Bushido. That is his strength. It is also his weakness."
designernotes: Art Notes - A ninja goading a samurai into recklessly charging him while concealing a poisoned dagger.

text:
(Duelists win tied duels versus non-Duelists.)
After Saigyo enters play, lose 2 Honor.
Ninja Battle: A target enemy Personality challenges Saigyo. Give the winner +2F.
title: Shosuro Saigyo

flavor: "And it had been such a lovely party."
designernotes: A beautiful female scorpion tracing a fingertip over her tea cup at a table, smiling. Seated around the table are three other dead samurai who died from drinking poisoned tea with her.

text: Ninja Open, :bow:: Your other target unbowed Ninja Personality challenges another player's target Personality. He may refuse; if he does, give him a -1F/-1C Poison token. Bow the loser.
title: Shosuro Sakura

flavor: "Well. Is that not interesting?"
designernotes: A Scorpion Shugenja using magic to gain political intelligence on his enemies to blackmail them.

text: After an action from Rei's unit dishonors another player's Personality, his controller loses 1 Honor. After the first time each turn her own Spell bows Rei, straighten her.
title: Soshi Rei

flavor: "No, no… keep your blade drawn. It seems a good way to make things fair between us."
designernotes: Art: A more weathered and scarred Atsushi staring down an opponent who does not look like he wants anything to do with this duel. Atsushi is clearly going to dominate this guy and is smugly satisfied about it.

text:
After Atsushi enters play, lose 2 Honor. After Atsushi wins a duel, give him a +1F Infamy token.
Battle: Fear 3 with +1 strength for each of Atsushi's Infamy tokens.
title: Daigotsu Atsushi

flavor: Not all those who serve the Spider Clan are soulless monsters. However, one would be hard pressed to find someone of another clan who cares to make the distinction.
designernotes: Art: A Daigotsu Samurai using her Katana to block an attack at the last second, protecting a Susumu Courtier.

text:
(Duelists win tied duels versus non-Duelists. You may Recruit a Reserve Personality, if they would be opposed, as an Absent Battle action.)
After Hachiko enters play, lose 1 Honor.
title: Daigotsu Hachiko

flavor: "Even in these times, creatures like her have their uses."
designernotes: Art: An attractive woman holding a conversation with some male individuals that are completely under her "spell." She has an evil glint in her eye that does not bode well for them.

text: Battle: Give a target enemy Personality a Force penalty equal to his own Personal Honor. If his Force is now zero, you may give him a -1F/-1C Poison token and lose 1 Honor.
title: Daigotsu Hayigi

flavor:
"You, samurai… why do you carry three blades?"
"That which is perfectly balanced for the duel is not ideal for war, my lord."
designernotes: Art: A mean looking Daigotsu Samurai standing above the crumpled corpse of someone he just easily bested in a duel. A surrounding crowd of courtiers looks on in horror, except for a single Susumu who has a satisfied look on his face.

text:
(Duelists win tied duels versus non-Duelists.)
Battle: Shaoru challenges a target enemy Personality. Each player must focus at least once in the duel. Give the winner +1F.
title: Daigotsu Shaoru

flavor: "His name is what? Is that a joke?" - Lao-she
designernotes: Art: A well armored Samurai hiding in the trees above a small caravan travelling through the jungle. He looks ready to jump down and ambush them shortly.

text:
Kumoru's Followers must be Ninja.
Ninja Open: Create a battlefield (not at any Province). Assign Kumoru to attack there and another player's target unbowed Personality to defend there. Fight a battle there. Battle resolution there will not destroy Personalities. Lose 2 Honor.
title: Goju Kumoru

flavor: "Some ask why I never trusted the Shadow Dragon and its ilk," Kanpeki grunted. "Look upon that thing and ask me that question."
designernotes: Art: A Ninja stalking a Samurai from the shadows, mimicking his pose and mannerisms completely.

text:
(You may Recruit a Reserve Personality, if they would be opposed, as an Absent Battle action.)
Mitsuru has +2F while opposing a Personality with no abilities.
title: Goju Mitsuru

flavor: "Thank you for your gift, friend," he whispered. "Your identity helps remind me of my own."
designernotes: Art: A more formal looking Yurishi dressed in a full Spider Clan kimono, straightening his Jingasa (which looks similar to Goju Adorai's). A dead body lies in the background with indistinguishable features, a hint at what Yurishi just finished doing.

text: Ninja Battle: Bow a target unbowed enemy Personality. If he has 0 Force or no abilities, create a 2F/2C/0PH Ninja • Shadowlands Spider Clan Personality. Lose 1 Honor.
title: Goju Yurishi

flavor: "The great master's body is dead, but his spirit? Nothing save the death of the universe can end Kokujin's spirit."
designernotes: Art: A Kokujin monk in one-on-one combat with a Samurai, breaking the Samurai's katana as he goes for the kill.

text:
(Duelists win tied duels versus non-Duelists.)
After Gunjao enters play, lose 2 Honor.
Battle: Fear 4 (Bow a target enemy Follower or Personality without Followers with 4 or lower Force).
title: Kokujin Gunjao

flavor: "Tribe serve Chuda. Father's tribe serve Chuda. Chuda no power but magic. Time to serve new master, maybe?"
designernotes: Art: A wicked looking goblin directing a troop of smaller goblins through the jungle. He has a similar looking feather headdress to the original Bakunai.

text:
(Draw a card after your Expendable card dies.)
After Naibu enters play, lose 1 Honor.
title: Naibu

flavor: "What need have I of a life of my own? I can have anyone's life I wish."
designernotes: Art - A horrifically twisted Goju (think Goju Utsusei).

text:
After The Twisted One enters play, lose 1 Honor.
Ninja Battle: Copy a Battle ability that does not copy abilities on a target enemy Personality. Remove the ability from the target.
title: The Twisted One

flavor: The essence of air is inconstant, ever-present, like a half-remembered whisper in the wind.
designernotes: The Elemental Dragon of Air.

text:
Cannot attach Followers or Items. Cannot gain a Clan Alignment. Has -2HR while you control the Ring of Air. After a phase begins, straighten Air Dragon.
Air Battle: Negate Air Dragon's current Force penalties.
title: Air Dragon

flavor: The essence of earth is resolute, inflexible, changing only by minute increments during mortal lifespans.
designernotes: The Elemental Dragon of Earth.

text: Cannot attach Followers or Items. Cannot gain a Clan Alignment. Has -2HR while you control the Ring of Earth. Before the first time each turn another player's action moves or bows the Earth Dragon, negate it.
title: Earth Dragon

flavor: The essence of fire is passion and anger, always consuming but ever-hungry.
designernotes: The Elemental Dragon of Fire.

text:
Cannot attach Followers or Items. Cannot gain a Clan Alignment except Phoenix Clan. Has -2HR while you control the Ring of Fire.
Fire Battle, :bow:: Ranged 7 Attack.
title: Fire Dragon

flavor: "I have lived an honorable life. I will not undo all I have accomplished in the twilight of my years."
designernotes: A Ronin Magistrate who wanders the Empire, bringing justice to the peasants.

text: Open, :bow:: Target a dishonorable Personality. After the next time this turn he attacks you or an action on his card resolves, gain 1 Honor.
title: Haikitsu

flavor: "The elements speak to me more purely than any clan shugenja. I hear their words without the bias of oaths or loyalties."
designernotes: A Ronin Shugenja riding a horse while water kami swirl around him.

text: Open, :g3:: Put a Ring from your hand into play; while it remains in play, it does not count towards an Enlightenment Victory. After your next turn begins, put it into your hand.
title: Kung-an

flavor: Legions of the Moto once rode within the Shadowlands. Their shame has been purged, but there are some remnants.
designernotes: An undead Moto riding a skeletal horse.

text:
(Once per turn, as an Absent Engage, move your unbowed Personality in a Cavalry unit to the battle.)
After Daigoro enters play, lose 4 Honor.
Battle: Fear 4.
title: Moto Daigoro

flavor: Few families have the great honor of serving the Emperor directly, with no oath of fealty to any clan. First among them are the Otomo, stewards of the political power of the Emerald Throne. Terumoto leads in his brother's place, for his elder brother's scandal was to marry into the Susumu family.

text: After Terumoto enters play, gain 1 Honor.
title: Otomo Terumoto

flavor: The Dragonfly are one of the smaller Minor Clans in Rokugan. They serve the Dragon, often acting as intermediaries with other clans.

text:
(This Personality is Unaligned.)
Invest :g5:: Give Jairyu a +1F/+1C token and the permanent ability, "Water Battle: Move home a target defending Personality."
title: Tonbo Jairyu

flavor: The essence of the Void is everything but nothing.
designernotes: The Elemental Dragon of the Void.

text: Cannot attach Followers or Items. Cannot gain a Clan Alignment. Has -2HR while you control the Ring of the Void. After the Void Dragon's army destroys any units or Province in a battle resolution, the enemy leader discards two cards from his hand.
title: Void Dragon

flavor: The essence of water is tumult, ever-changing. It is the calmed sea that rages and is calmed again.
designernotes: The Elemental Dragon of Water.

text:
Cannot attach Followers or Items. Cannot gain a Clan Alignment. Has -2HR while you control the Ring of Water.
Water Tireless Open: Water Dragon copies another target Personality's keyword, trait, or ability that does not copy abilities.
title: Water Dragon

flavor: Many underestimate the Unicorn magistrates because of their compassionate nature. It is due to this compassion that they are so driven to find and punish the guilty and the wicked, however.
designernotes: A rare Iuchi magistrate.

text: (Shugenja may attach and cast Spells.)
title: Iuchi Daitoru

flavor: "The Tsuruchi think themselves master of the bow. I would like to try my hand against one of them one day."
designernotes: A Unicorn Samurai firing a bow from foot.

text: Battle, :bow:: Ranged 3 Attack. Straighten Aikenro if you have moved your Cavalry Personality to Aikenro's battlefield this turn.
title: Moto Aikenro

flavor: In all places the Shogun traveled, he spoke reverently of his father's deeds and actions. In his wake, others began to think differently of the name Chagatai.
designernotes: A seasoned Unicorn Commander barking orders at his troops.

text: Battle: Fear equal to your target Follower's Force, with +1 strength if the Fear targets an enemy Infantry card.
title: Moto Taigo, Shogun

flavor: "Explain it to me again, Phoenix. Explain how my grandfather's blood makes me corrupted."

text:
(Once per turn, as an Absent Engage, move your unbowed Personality in a Cavalry unit to the battle.)
After an action resolves, straighten each unit it moved into Yao-tsu's army.
title: Moto Yao-tsu

flavor: "My grandmother protected the Empire from threats from the west. Now I protect the west from threats. Fate is strange."

text: (Once per turn, as an Absent Engage, move your unbowed Personality in a Cavalry unit to the battle.)
title: Moto Zaitsuta

flavor: "Dishonor is a weakness, and a dishonorable leader infects his entire unit."
designernotes: A Shinjo Magistrate dueling a disgraced samurai.

text: Battle: Fear 3 that may target a dishonorable Personality with Followers. If this bowed a dishonorable Personality, you may rehonor him to gain 1 Honor.
title: Shinjo Hamura

flavor: "I am not a gaijin. I am a true samurai, like every other follower of Shinjo-kami."

text: Interrupt: After your Battle action Recruits your Personality, take an additional action.
title: Shinjo Jalendu

flavor: "Tselu-sama, here is another one. The brothers may not want bloodshed, but sooner or later some brash fool will draw steel."
designernotes: A Shinjo Magistrate riding a horse.

text:
(Once per turn, as an Absent Engage, move your unbowed Personality in a Cavalry unit to the battle. Loyal Personalities will not join other Clans.)
Political Open, :bow:: Target a Personality. After the next time this turn he attacks you, dishonor him.
title: Shinjo Jao-shen

flavor: "I can only hope that on the battlefield, he causes the same amount of horror in the Empire's enemies as he inspires in me." - Doji Dainagon

text:
During an Attack Phase, if Nobunaga has not moved that phase, he has +1F and his printed Ranged Attack has +1 strength.
Battle, :bow:: Ranged 3 Attack.
title: Shinjo Nobunaga

flavor: "Your blade is your second weapon. Your mind must be your first."
designernotes: Shinjo Tae-hyun, having given up his role as Commander and moved on to re-form the Shinjo Magistrates.

text:
Other players' effects will not move dishonorable Personalities to oppose your Magistrates.
Battle: Dishonor a target enemy Personality. You may take an additional action printed on your Magistrate or a card in his unit.
title: Shinjo Tae-hyun

flavor: "He is a splendid warrior from a clan of splendid warriors. I am sure his aunt is very proud of him." - Moto Naleesh

text: Battle: Move home your target Personality.
title: Shinjo Zhi-tae

flavor: "I do not wish to quarrel with priests, but I have a reminder for the leaders of the Phoenix: death and rebirth come to all, warrior and priest alike."
designernotes: A young Battle Maiden riding down an enemy.

text: Battle: Give a target enemy Follower or Personality a Force penalty equal to Kazue's Personal Honor. Gain 1 Honor.
title: Utaku Kazue

flavor: "Many of my brothers in arms seem to have forgotten the danger our eternal enemy presents. As for myself, I have no time for celebrations. There is work to be done."
designernotes: Art - Hida Toranosuke standing casually over the smashed and destroyed bodies of several huge badass oni and monsters, with his trademark mask and a jade-studded tetsubo. Focus character, so this should be suitably epic.

text:
(Once per game per card, a Resilient card does not die in battle resolution.)
Jade Battle, :bow:: Melee 3 Attack. Straighten Toranosuke if he has a Heavy Weapon or if the target is Shadowlands.
title: Hida Toranosuke

flavor: "The Voice has said that we must fortify this coastline. There are many better uses we could make of this stone… but it is not our place to question an Imperial command."
designernotes: Angry looking old crab builder.

text:
(Draw a card after you Recruit a Destined card.)
Compassion: Gizen has +1F for each Fortification at his battlefield, to a maximum of 3 Fortifications. (Compassion takes effect while you have fewer Provinces than anyone else.)
title: Kaiu Gizen

flavor: "From this port we shall set forth to destroy the Spider once and for all!"
designernotes: A boasting Crab builder with tools in hand.

text:
Invest :g1:: Create a Fortification Holding with the trait "This Province has +1 strength" and attach it to your target Province.
Open: If it is not your turn, target your Fortification. Before this turn ends, if it is still in play, gain 1 Honor.
title: Kaiu Otogou

flavor: "The Earth spirits whisper to me, whisper of unease, even of fear. I wonder, does anyone else hear them? Or are all too busy with these petty festivals?"
designernotes: A very tall woman kuni shugenja

text: Invest :g5:, or :g3: if any other player is Crane Clan: Give Igarasu two +1F/+1C tokens.
title: Kuni Igarasu

flavor: The Kuni are known to rival the Isawa as masters of Earth's protective powers. Of course, the Kuni put those powers to far more aggressive use as well.
designernotes: Massive, ripped kuni shugenja.

text: Earth Battle: Melee 3 Attack (Destroy a target enemy Follower or Personality without Followers with 3 or lower Force).
title: Kuni Soseki

flavor: "When the Scorpion asked him what sort of mask he wanted, he remembered a story about an angry kappa. Now they call him the Masked Tortoise." - Toritaka Chokichi
designernotes: A fierce looking warrior with a kappa mask and shell like armor.

text: Battle, :bow:: Fear 4. Straighten Suppon if you are Scorpion Clan or if your army has fewer units than the enemy army.
title: Toritaka Suppon

flavor: "Wise generals say, 'few can overcome many,' but I have found that the honorable are rarely willing to dwell upon how that is possible."
designernotes: A true Iron Crane of the Daidoji with a Yari in his hand.

text:
Kuraou has +1F/+1C while he has a Spear or opposes a Crab Clan Personality.
Battle: Give a target enemy Personality -3F.
title: Daidoji Kuraou

flavor: "The weapons of the lawless are many, but none so dangerous as knowledge of the law."
designernotes: A dashing Crane Magistrate/Duelist.

text:
Compassion: Buredo has +1F/+1C/+1PH. (Compassion takes effect while you have fewer Provinces than anyone else.)
Phoenix Clan players may Proclaim Buredo.
title: Doji Buredo

flavor: She smiled as she told her story, all the while listening to every word the nearby Otomo said.
designernotes: A beautiful Crane female with long dark hair draped over one shoulder tells tales to a gathering of enthralled teenagers.

text:
Compassion: Hoshihana has Destined. (Compassion takes effect while you have fewer Provinces than anyone else.)
Tireless Open: If you have resolved an action from a Political Strategy this turn, straighten Hoshihana.
title: Doji Hoshihana

flavor: "I have long come to terms with the wolf inside. You might even say we each look after one another."
designernotes: A lithe and dangerously beautiful Crane female with long white hair adorned with flowers. Bangs hang over her left eye and she has a beauty mark under her right eye. She has a porcelain kitsune mask worn on her hip. She is smirking slyly and sheathing her sword as she walks away from a defeated drunken ronin (WC canon character so her description needs to be accurate).

text:
(Once per game per card, a Resilient card does not die in battle resolution.)
Iaijutsu Battle: Fear 2. If this bowed a Personality with lower Personal Honor, give Moro +1F.
title: Doji Moro

flavor: "Shh! Don't tell anyone. It will be our secret, my little friend…"
designernotes: A creepy Kakita Jester watching a discreet discussion between Yasuki courtiers from around a corner with a smile.

text: Political Open: Target another player's Personality. After the first time (this turn) the target assigns or moves to a battlefield, move Iwari there, and if the target is attacking, his player loses 1 Honor, or 2 Honor if the target is Crab Clan.
title: Kakita Iwari

flavor: "Oh look. Here come more fools. Another round, brother? A chance to win your money back?"
designernotes: Art - Kakita Shinichi smiles as he looks over his shoulder at Kakita Daitsu, who is standing back to back with him (scene is framed looking at Shinichi, so you can only make out Daitsu's outline). Both are drawing their swords, surrounded by enemies. Focus character, so art should be epic.

text:
Shinichi's focused cards have +1FV while you control, or he is dueling, Kakita Daitsu.
Iaijutsu Unstoppable Battle: Shinichi challenges a target enemy Personality, who may move home to refuse. Bow the loser.
title: Kakita Shinichi

flavor: He bowed beneath the eyes of the hesitant Ide. "Haven't our clans feuded for long enough?"

text:
(Draw a card after your Expendable card dies.)
Compassion, or if you are Unicorn Clan: Akito has +2F/+2C. (Compassion takes effect while you have fewer Provinces than anyone else.)
title: Kitsuki Akito

flavor:
"The Dragon were stewards of the Spider. You are no better than them!"
Mizukabe's hand touched his bow. "Would you care to repeat that?" he whispered.

text: Battle, :bow:: Ranged 3 Attack, or Ranged 4 Attack if the target is dishonorable.
title: Kitsuki Mizukabe

flavor: "The past cannot be changed and should not be dwelled upon. We must occupy our minds with the present, but never forget the future which we shape with our every action."
designernotes: Art - Higaru in a stance on a rock under a waterfall, both swords out, in deep meditation as the water cascades over him. Focus character, so the art should be epic.

text: Battle, :bow:: Straighten your target Ring. You may bow one of Higaru's Swords to straighten him.
title: Mirumoto Higaru

flavor: "I hope the earth opens up! I hope it swallows you all!"

text:
(Once per game per card, a Resilient card does not die in battle resolution.)
Battle: Melee Attack equal to the number of Hirakura's Spirit Followers (this is a Melee 0 Attack if he has no Spirit Followers).
title: Tamori Hirakura

flavor: "Very well! If you refuse to listen to my words, then perhaps I shall let the kami speak for themselves!"

text: Courtesy: Mabasu and his Spirit Followers have Cavalry. (Courtesy traits do not take effect if you went first.)
title: Tamori Mabasu

flavor: "Sensei once told me, the purpose of the monk is to 'illuminate the path.'"

text:
After Tameko enters play, give her three +1F Fire tokens.
Fire Battle: Ranged Attack equal to the number of Tameko's Fire tokens, plus 1 if the target is Mantis Clan. Remove one of Tameko's Fire tokens.
title: Togashi Tameko

flavor: Kano had returned to serve his sister and the Lion, but the whispers of Matsu Hitomi troubled him. "What you describe… it cannot be," he said softly.
designernotes: Art - Akodo Kano stands overlooks a vast battlefield of troops from afar, with the spirit of Matsu Hitomi looming behind him. Focus character, so art should be epic.

text:
Increase Kano's Force bonuses from the rulebook Tactical Advantage action by 2 if he has a Tessen.
Battle: Give a target Battle Strategy without Discipline in your discard pile Discipline :g2:.
title: Akodo Kano, Master Tactician

flavor: "Draw your sword, Bayushi. Give me exactly what I want."
designernotes: Art: A young Lion duelist with shiny and undamaged armor that shows he has not been through many battles. He is eager to prove himself and has set his sights on a group of Scorpion, his hands resting on is katana ready to draw.

text: Iaijutsu Battle: Naotaka challenges a target enemy Personality. Give the winner +2F.
title: Akodo Naotaka

flavor: "Loyalty is not learned, neither is it inherited. Unlike Imperial positions filled by right of blood, loyalty must be earned. Forget this, and you have done your enemy's work for him." - Akodo's Leadership
designernotes:
(Flavor text should be something from Akodo's Leadership per Winter Court)
Art: Toshigure is a personality from Winter Court 3. He is your typical stuck up and formal Lion Samurai, but he looks very weathered for his age due to the amount of battles and duels he has participated in. He is staring down a Spider sohei that he has just bested in a duel, numerous wounds clearly displayed about his person. Despite the damage he is maintaining his stance, refusing to show weakness to someone unworthy.

text: Toshigure has -1C while dueling Doji Moro. Toshigure has +1PH if he won a duel this turn or you are Mantis Clan.
title: Akodo Toshigure

flavor: "This man was seen in the vicinity of the Kitsu Tombs shortly before the Scorpion attack. If he knows anything, I must know it as well. If he was involved, then even the Heavens cannot save him from my wrath."
designernotes: Art: A Lion Magistrate walking the streets of the Second City. He is talking with locals and trying to track down a specific individual, using a wanted poster to check if they have seen him.

text:
(Once per game per card, a Resilient card does not die in battle resolution.)
Battle: Give a target enemy Personality -2F. If he is Scorpion Clan, give Kiyomako +1F.
title: Ikoma Kiyomako

flavor: "I enjoy my duty, but I wish the older ones wouldn't stare."
designernotes: Art: A young Matsu Beastmaster in the process of training a Lion cub. In the background, the indistinct form of a much larger Lion looks on, making sure everything is proceeding normally.

text: Compassion: Equipping Nonhuman Followers to Hideyuki is a Battle/Open for you, for 1 less gold if Hideyuki entered play this battle. (Compassion takes effect while you have fewer Provinces than anyone else.)
title: Matsu Hideyuki

flavor: "They can stare until their eyes fall out, for all I care! I will take my allies as they appear."
designernotes: Art: A Lion Samurai meditating amidst the rocky foothills of a mountain. Beside her is a Zokujin, mimicking the Lion's stance.

text:
You may destroy one of Kaori's unbowed Nonhuman Followers to refuse a challenge targeting her and negate all effects of refusing.
Earth Battle: Fear 2.
title: Matsu Kaori

flavor: "Another has been vouchsafed this vision, and I catch only the edges of it. Yet even that glimpse terrifies me. Have the Heavens forsaken us?"
designernotes: Art: A conservative looking Moshi doing research in a library. She seems flustered as if something is wrong or something she has uncovered may bode ill.

text: After a card enters another player's hand from his or her own card's effect, target your Personality with fewer Omen tokens than his Personal Honor, and give him a +1F/+1C Omen token.
title: Kitsune Narako

flavor: There are some among the Moshi who have truly embraced their Mantis identity, rather to their sisters' chagrin.
designernotes: Art: A Moshi Shugenja on the deck of a ship, angrily directing some Yoritomo sailors to do their jobs. A storm rages, pouring rain everywhere.

text: Battle, :bow:: Ranged 2 Attack. Straighten Kyan if you have Compassion or the target was Dragon Clan. (Compassion takes effect while you have fewer Provinces than anyone else.)
title: Moshi Kyan

flavor: The Tsuruchi are no longer the wandering bounty-hunters of their past, but they are still the Empire's finest archers.

text:
Positive numerals in the text box of Akira's Bow Items have +1. (2 is a numeral, two is not.)
Battle, :bow:: Ranged 4 Attack. If this is not increased or combined, it can target a Province and reduce its strength by the Ranged Attack's strength.
title: Tsuruchi Akira

flavor: "Danjuro's training has aided me in many things… but this?"
designernotes: Art: An armored magistrate trying to have a conversation with a Zokujin (Zlkyt). He seems flustered, but not to the point of anger. On his belt is a Daisho that is marked with a Phoenix Mon and colors, despite him being clearly a Mantis samurai (a sign of his training with Shiba Danjuro).

text:
Compassion: Kinshikirai's printed ability has no Gold Cost. (Compassion takes effect while you have fewer Provinces than anyone else.)
Interrupt, :g2:: If the action is yours or you are Lion Clan, after it resolves, straighten Kinshikirai.
title: Yoritomo Kinshikirai

flavor: "I much prefer a simple weapon, due to the risks of sea travel. There are times, though, when a man must draw steel."
designernotes: Art: A buff Mantis Sailor repairing a weapon that seems to have been worn from constant use. His workbench contains a variety of weapons and tools for refurbishing damaged items.

text:
(You may Recruit a Reserve Personality, if they would be opposed, as an Absent Battle action.)
After Kyunan enters play, you may take one or two additional actions to Equip Peasant Weapons to him.
title: Yoritomo Kyunan

flavor: "I survived the Dark Naga's onslaught. Do you think I fear a few ruins beneath the sea?"
designernotes: Art - Daughter of Yoritomo Minori. She is 1/4 naga, so she should have that exotic look to her. Perhaps gazing longingly from the deck of a boat at a ruined Naga Temple in the distance. Focus character, so art should be epic.

text:
Minoko has Naval while she has a Peasant Weapon.
Battle, :bow:: Melee 3 Attack. If this does not destroy a Personality, straighten Minoko.
title: Yoritomo Minoko

flavor: "I want to know where the Spider have gone, wave man. You know, and you are going to tell me."
designernotes: [Note: A stalwart defender who can shrug off an immense amount of pain for how little he is.]

text:
Melee and Ranged Attacks may not target Kazuki.
Battle, :bow:: Fear 4, with +1 strength if the target is Shadowlands, and +1 strength if you have Compassion.
title: Asako Kazuki

flavor: The Unicorn waystation shattered, and samurai scattered in all directions. A lone Phoenix emerged, the earth swirling about him in a maelstrom.
designernotes: [Note: A generic Earth Shugenja who puts his duty to his Clan above his own Honor Requirements.]

text: (Once per game per card, a Resilient card does not die in battle resolution.)
title: Asako Nashimoto

flavor: "Hmm," he pondered. "Yes, I think I know where the Spider might be. I must inform my lord at… what was that sound?"
designernotes: An Isawa Water Shugenja, researching through scrolls, looking for answers to a question he dare not ask. Story character.

text:
(You may Recruit a Reserve Personality, if they would be opposed, as an Absent Battle action.)
Interrupt, :g*:: After Fujisawa enters play, Equip a target Spell to him from your hand or discard pile.
title: Isawa Fujisawa

flavor: "The situation with the Unicorn is unacceptable. The Masters will either choose to apologize, or unleash the Phoenix's true power. Either way, it will be momentous."
designernotes: Art - Isawa Hibana writing burning kanji in the air from her fingertip, while her other arm holds several scrolls. Focus character, so art should be suitably epic.

text: Ranged Attacks from Hibana's Spells have +1 strength. Hibana has Conqueror while she has a Fire Spell. Hibana Equips Fire Spells for 2 less Gold.
title: Isawa Hibana

flavor: "You are a fool to challenge one who commands the power of the tides, Moto."
designernotes: [Note: A Water Shugenja who fights fiercer when he is backed into a corner.]

text:
(Draw a card after your Expendable card dies.)
Compassion, or if any other player is Unicorn Clan: Nobuo has +1F/+1C. (Compassion takes effect while you have fewer Provinces than anyone else.)
title: Isawa Nobuo

flavor: Sitting up, he inhaled sharply, suddenly. "What happened? Where am I?" The naginata at his side did not reveal its secrets.
designernotes: The Phoenix Samurai from Awakend Naginata, returning to life.

text:
After Hano enters the discard pile, he becomes Honorably Dead. Hano Equips Polearms for 1 less Gold.
Battle: Melee 2 Attack. Gain 1 Honor if this destroyed a card or you are Crane Clan.
title: Shiba Hano

flavor: The rout of the Lion from Shamate Pass after their defeat at the Second Pit was an offense no Lion would ever forgive, and no Scorpion would ever forget.
designernotes: A Scorpion Samurai.

text:
