(Once per game per card, a Resilient card does not die in battle resolution. Battle: Discard a card to give this Tactician a Force bonus equal to the card's Focus Value.)
Battle: Give a target enemy Personality -2F. Bow him if he is Lion Clan.
title: Bayushi Chizuken

flavor: "These words go to you exactly as they came to me."
designernotes: Art - Bayushi Fuyuko smiles slyly as she taps her closed fan on her chin, looking over reports. She needs a less Crane look to her than previously, needs to look more like a Scorpion, instigating. Focus character, so art should be suitably awesome.

text:
You Recruit Doji Natsuyo for 1 less Gold.
Political Open: Target two Personalities controlled by the same player. Fuyuko sows seeds of distrust. After the next time this turn they are attacking in the same army together, their controller loses 1 Honor, or 2 Honor if each of them has 3 or more printed Personal Honor.
title: Bayushi Fuyuko

flavor: The fire exploded behind him, hurling him forward, singeing the plates of his armor. He only laughed, the sound terrifying those who survived the destruction.
designernotes: A veteran Bitter Lies Kensai, able to adapt whatever circumstances he's facing.

text: Open: Remove a Madness token from Tenburo to give him Cavalry, Conqueror, or Naval.
title: Bayushi Tenburo

flavor: "I think it well past time that the Lion became acquainted with some of our more… clandestine assets. Don't you agree?" - Bayushi Nitoshi
designernotes: A Scorpion Ninja scouting out his target.

text:
After Kanako enters play, lose 2 Honor.
Compassion, or if you are Crab Clan: Kanako has Destined. (Compassion takes effect while you have fewer Provinces than anyone else.)
title: Shosuro Kanako

flavor: "Send more Matsu to the Pass, Lion! My blade still thirsts for your blood!"
designernotes: A Scorpion Kensai laughing madly in the middle of a battlefield.

text:
(Kensai may attach two One-Handed Weapons.)
After Wayari enters play, give a target Personality a Madness token.
title: Shosuro Wayari

flavor: "The Matsu are a hardy folk, even for the Lion. Many of our subtler poisons do not work. They need a very special blend…"
designernotes: A Scorpion Master of Poisons.

text:
After Mumoshi enters play, lose 2 Honor.
Ninja Battle, :bow:: Ranged 2 Attack. Straighten Mumoshi if he has a Ninja Weapon or the target has a Poison token.
title: Soshi Mumoshi

flavor: "Kanpeki-sama has welcomed us back into the fold, my pets. It is time that we repaid the favor and hunt those who hunt him."
designernotes: Art: This is a Chuda, they are now returning to the fold in secret.

text: Maho Battle: Fear equal to the Force of your target Personality; destroy him if he is bowed, and bow him if he is unbowed.
title: Chuda Teraiko

flavor: "Give me your blessing, father. Let me bring ruin."
designernotes: Kanpeki fully accepting the taint and the extra power that goes with it

text:
After Kanpeki enters play, lose 3 Honor.
Your Fear effects may target Items and Spells. Your Shadowlands Personalities without a printed Fear ability have the ability, "Battle: Fear 2."
Battle: Fear 5.
title: Daigotsu Kanpeki, Unleashed

flavor: "A moth! How delightful. So delicate. So fragile. So innocent. You remind me of myself in so many ways, little one."
designernotes: A cute, unthreatening looking female spider duelist with short white hair smiles at a butterfly that has landed on her extended hand. She is surrounded by a dozen dead and slaughtered opponents. Her other hand rests on the handle of a wicked sword stained with blood and planted blade-down into the ground.

text:
Onita has +1F/+1C while she has a Sword.
Open: Give Onita +2F/-2C. Duels in which she is the challenger are duels of Force (this turn).
title: Daigotsu Onita

flavor: "We could have been their allies. Now they will regret every slur, every insult. They will pay in blood and bone."
designernotes: A dark Spider Yojimbo walks away after having slaughtered his non-Spider charge and his family after being ordered by Kanpeki to cut ties with the Empire.

text: Compassion: If Spider Clan is your only Clan Alignment, you may Recruit Tomiyama as an Open. (Compassion takes effect while you have fewer Provinces than anyone else.)
title: Daigotsu Tomiyama

flavor: Kenteiru's blade descended. The guard would never report what he had seen. Kenteiru's features shifted. The guard would not be missed.
designernotes: A Goju Ninja twisting their body disturbingly to slip through a small crack in a wall in order to assassinate a guard on the other side. Art should be an homage to original Ninja Shadow Walker.

text:
After Kenteiru enters play, lose 3 Honor.
Compassion: Kenteiru has Naval. (Compassion takes effect while you have fewer Provinces than anyone else.)
title: Goju Kenteiru

flavor: "The dragon is not with us any longer," Aitso whispered. "And so my kin and I need… certain things. Things you can supply."
designernotes: A disturbingly sensual faceless woman lounges on a silk bed, surrounded by adoring male and female samurai in some kind of trance.

text: Battle, :bow:: Bow a target enemy Personality with lower Chi. If he has no abilities, create a 2F/2C/0PH Ninja • Shadowlands Personality.
title: Ninube Aitso

flavor: "Of low birth I may be, but I am a warrior born just the same."
designernotes: A seasoned ashigaru, who's now leading his own Ashigaru unit.

text:
After Ashigaru Gunso enters play, if your Sensei is Hikahime, create a 0F/1C/0PH Ashigaru • Conscript Personality.
Battle: Bow one or more of your target unbowed Ashigaru Conscripts. Ranged Attack equal to the number this bowed.
title: Ashigaru Gunso

flavor: "You cast me out unjustly, then dare lay claim to what is mine? I will see you all burn!"
designernotes: Banished, killing a Phoenix Clan Personality with some unholy Void Fire. He flees and gets away, but has to leave his stolen item from TNO behind.

text:
After Banished enters play, lose 2 Honor. Will not join a Phoenix Clan player.
Void Battle: Ranged 3 Attack. If this destroys a Phoenix Clan Personality, you may move Banished home.
title: Banished

flavor: "Of course, my lord. My weapon is yours to do as you please."
designernotes: An ashigaru soldier, inexperienced and afraid.

text:
After Kenturo enters play, if your Sensei is Hikahime, create a 0F/1C/0PH Ashigaru • Conscript Personality.
Battle: Bow one or more of your target unbowed Ashigaru Conscripts. Give a target enemy Follower or Personality a Force penalty equal to the number this bowed.
title: Kenturo

flavor: The ascendance of a new Emperor is always a matter of great concern for the Imperial families. The shugenja tradition of the Seppun, in particular, must acclimate to their new charge and ensure his habits are taken into consideration.
designernotes: An Imperial Magistrate sent to determine the danger of these prophecies

flavor: It is not a fact that most shugenja dwell upon, but there are spirits who watch over the lower castes, not merely samurai. It causes some to question certain truths that ought not be questioned…
designernotes: A Spirit protecting the weak and defenseless.

text:
Battle: Straighten one or two of your target Conscripts.
Battle: Bow one or more of your target unbowed Ashigaru Conscripts. Fear equal to the number this bowed.
title: Venerable Spirit

flavor: "Fool. You insult my blood, you insult my ancestors. Would any samurai respond differently?"
designernotes: A veteran moto warrior with painted face (white guard style) riding someone down with a lance.

text:
(You may Recruit a Reserve Personality, if they would be opposed, as an Absent Battle action.)
Battle, :bow:: Ranged 2 Attack. Straighten Baatar if he has a Spear, the Ranged Attack targeted a Phoenix Clan Personality, or he entered play this battle.
title: Moto Baatar

flavor: "The Empire is a vast and wondrous place, and at any given time there are a multitude of fascinating events transpiring. None of this has caused me to forget Shikei's insult."
designernotes: A young smiling magistrate visibly a nice person.

text:
Chairei has +1F if you are Dragon Clan.
Courtesy: Chairei has Cavalry. (Courtesy traits do not take effect if you went first.)
title: Shinjo Chairei

flavor: "My words may not inspire, nor my deeds inflame the soul. But I can harness the fervor in my troops' hearts. Our honor is why we shall never be broken."

text:
(You may Recruit a Reserve Personality, if they would be opposed, as an Absent Battle action.)
Battle: Give a target enemy Personality a Force penalty equal to your target unbowed Personality's Personal Honor.
title: Shinjo Tsung-min

flavor: "I will not allow you to sully these plains. Death awaits those who would threaten my home."
designernotes: A young utaku battle maiden.

text:
(Once per turn, as an Absent Engage, move your unbowed Personality in a Cavalry unit to the battle.)
Masako has +1F/+1C for each of your Provinces that have been destroyed this game.
title: Utaku Masako

flavor: The Unicorn spent centuries wandering the lands beyond the Empire. During this time, samurai and peasant alike were united in the cause of survival. The Unicorn have not forgotten those roots.
designernotes: Art - Sakiko compassionately kneeling to assist a wounded peasant and his frightened family, her noble beloved steed standing behind her. Focus character, so art should be suitably awesome.

text: Battle, :bow:: Melee 3 Attack that may bow the target instead of destroying it; if this bows the target, gain 2 Honor. If Sakiko has entered play or moved this turn, straighten her.
title: Utaku Sakiko

flavor: "Since the return of Lady Shinjo, stories have surfaced of a child who neither ages or dies. There are rumors that she is... immortal."
designernotes: Young Utaku Female with a focus on never dying and being reborn. And by young, we mean 8 or younger.

text: Compassion: Zo Sia has the ability, "Open, : If Zo Sia is honorably dead, put her face-up in your target Province, discarding any card there." (Compassion takes effect while you have fewer Provinces than anyone else.)
story: 2013 Jack Vasel Memorial Fund Charity Auction - Bartlomiej Chrobak
title: Utaku Zo Sia

flavor:
"Come, sister! Let us crush these Spider with the might of the first Crab Thunder's bloodline!"
"I think I heard one of them say we only had a single samurai's worth of eyes between us," Ayameko replied, smiling with a vengeful relish.
designernotes: Male crab warrior in grey heavy armor wielding a dai tsuchi (warhammer) with jade and ivory inlays running around the edges and center of the weapon in his right hand. A long jagged scar runs down his left eye which is covered by a tsuba eyepatch. His facial hair is neatly trimmed into a goatee. In his left hand he is pointing forward with a tessen with the mon of the Crab Clan and the Hida on it. He is shouting orders to the troops behind him as a battle rages on in the distance. At his left hip rests his daisho. He has black hair and is tall about 6'2 and has an athletic build. His head is shaven completely bald.

text: Battle: Melee 1 Attack, with +2 strength if Genda has a Heavy Weapon or has used his rulebook Tactical Advantage ability this turn.
title: Hida Genda

flavor: "All according to plan."
designernotes: An older Kaiu Engineer, directing a team of workers.

text:
Other players' Melee and Ranged attacks targeting cards in Eichi's unit have a strength penalty equal to the number of your Fortifications at his battlefield.
Battle: Take an additional action from your Fortification, even if it is at an adjacent battlefield.
title: Kaiu Eichi

flavor: "The nickname's a joke, but it isn't wise to laugh about it." - Kaiu Gorobei
designernotes: A hulking, mean-looking Kaiu Engineer.

text: O-Taro enters play for 1 less Gold during battle for each Fortification attached to the current Province. After you discard a card for an Honor action, give O-Taro +1F. You may Proclaim O-Taro even if it is not your turn.
title: Kaiu O-Taro

flavor: The revelations about the Taint forced the Kuni to spread themselves thin, seeking all who might be corrupted.
designernotes: A pale, sickly-looking Kuni Shugenja.

text:
Hokinsha has +1C if you are Mantis Clan or have Courtesy. (Courtesy does not take effect if you went first.)
Battle: Straighten your Sensei. You may use its abilities a second time this turn. Take an additional action.
title: Kuni Hokinsha

flavor: "At last, the Spider will perish."
designernotes: Kuni Renyu, the Kuni Daimyo.

text:
Your Provinces have +1 strength. Your Earth Personalities (including Renyu) have Resilient.
Earth Jade Tireless Battle: Straighten your target Earth Personality. You may target and bow an enemy card with Shadowlands or with lower Force than Renyu.
title: Kuni Renyu

flavor: "I want to show you something Tamori Seiken-sama taught me," was the last thing the goblins heard, other than the sound of their own bones snapping beneath stone hooves.
designernotes: A Kuni who can burrow through earth as if swimming through water, allowing him to travel great distances quickly.

text:
Tenba has Cavalry while you are the Defender and he has an Earth Spell.
Battle: Give a target enemy Follower or Personality -3F.
title: Kuni Tenba

flavor: He struck with blinding speed, but his expression never changed. "Your incompetence bores me, criminal."
designernotes: Some disorderly ronin look on, startled, as their leader is knocked out by a blow to the face from the handle of the sheathed sword of an intimidating Crane Emerald Magistrate.

text: After the first time each turn you resolve an Honor action, give Ikei a +1F Respect token if he has two or fewer Respect tokens.
title: Doji Ikei

flavor: "Politics never ends."
designernotes: Doji Natsuyo sits in elegant repose in a garden, contemplating an open scroll with a Scorpion seal.

text:
Ignore Natsuyo's Honor Requirement while you control Bayushi Fuyuko.
Political Home Interrupt, :bow:: When taking Honor Interrupts to the action, you may remove Political Honor cards in your discard pile from the game instead of discarding them from your hand.
title: Doji Natsuyo

flavor: "Sins are useful tools. I cannot believe we have made so little use of them before."
designernotes: A smiling Doji Soeka leans against a doorway, observing a conversation between a Susumu and a Dragon courtier in the background.

text:
Political Open: Remove an ability from a target Holding or attachment.
Tireless Battle: Move Soeka home. (Tireless actions may be taken even while bowed.)
title: Doji Soeka

flavor: "Those old sparring sessions saved my life that day, Shinichi-san. I owe you much."
designernotes: Kakita Daitsu, back to back with Kakita Shinichi, drawing his blade with a smile, while they are surrounded by enemies.

text:
Cards focused by Daitsu's opponent in duels have -1FV while you control, or the opponent is, Kakita Shinichi. Daitsu will only attach one Weapon.
Iaijutsu Battle, :bow:: Melee 3 Attack. You may bow a Sword attached to Daitsu to straighten him.
title: Kakita Daitsu

flavor: The Kakita Jesters are often sneered at by other samurai - until a moment of mockery steals their On before all the court.
designernotes: A jester mocking an advancing and angry samurai with exaggerated feigned panic.

text: Political Battle, :bow:: Move home a target enemy dishonorable Personality.
title: Kakita Inaka

flavor: "How could my silly faces offend a fine warrior such as yourself?"
designernotes: An impeccably attired Crane Courtier in court whose face is concealed behind an expressionless white mask held up like a masquerade mask, on a wooden handle. His arms are crossed, and in his other hand he holds a closed fan.

text:
Melee and Ranged Attacks targeting Oshaberi have -3 strength.
Political Engage: Other players do not gain Honor for destroying your cards in this battle's resolution.
Political Open, :bow:: Straighten your Sensei.
title: Kakita Oshaberi

flavor: "You have no reason to be here today, samurai. Your lord shall hear of this transgression."
designernotes: Bald Kitsuki smoking  with a fierce air.

text:
(Draw a card after you Recruit a Destined card.)
Interrupt: After the action destroys a dishonorable Personality, gain 1 Honor.
Engage: Dishonor a target enemy Personality with lower Chi.
title: Kitsuki Goshi

flavor: "Do not place your trust in words or people. Trust your senses and reason." - Agasha Kitsuki
designernotes: An old Courtier, grey hair, inspecting closely a piece of evidence with an air of satisfaction on his face, as if he found something.

text:
(Once per game per card, a Resilient card does not die in battle resolution.)
Political Interrupt, :bow:: If you took an Honor Interrupt to the action, return the Honor card you discarded for it to your hand. You may not take Honor actions this turn.
title: Kitsuki Goto

flavor: "Forget honor, pretty words, and loyalty. I have my skill and my blade. I will prevail in every battle."
designernotes: Female tattoed Duelist, drawing her weapons and smirking.

text:
(Duelists win tied duels versus non-Duelists.)
Battle: If Konoe is opposed, look at the top three cards of your Fate deck. You may discard a card to put one of them into your hand; if it is Iaijutsu, you may take an additional action to play it. Put the other cards back in any order.
title: Mirumoto Konoe

flavor: They serve as the clan requires.
designernotes: 3 monks brothers, almost identical save for their tatoos, each in relation to their different elements (Fire, Air and Void), each adopting a diferent martial arts stance. They must give the impression of working as one.

text: After Sannin enters play, permanently give them one of the following abilities (and its elemental keyword) not already on your Sannin in play: "Void Dynasty, :bow:: Recruit a Sannin from your discard pile or Dynasty deck."; "Fire Battle, :bow:: Melee 3 Attack."; or "Air Battle: Straighten a target Sannin."
title: Sannin

flavor: "Crush them, my friend."
designernotes:
Tamori Daiishu and his Spirit,wrecking havoc. Spirit can be seen here - http://imperialassembly.com/oracle/#cardid=11899

(also appears later in this set)

text:
Invest :g2:, or :g0: if you have Courtesy: Search your deck for The Mountainborn or Bound Spirit, show it, and put it in your hand. (Courtesy does not take effect if you went first.)
Earth Battle, :bow:: Melee 3 Attack. You may bow one of Daiishu's Followers to straighten him.
erratum: Erratum via Oracle for misspelling of second Follower title in trait.
title: Tamori Daiishu

flavor: The Tamori force themselves to be strong, to be rigid, to endure. In doing so, they hope never again to repeat the terrible corruption from the start of their line.
designernotes: Muscular young Shugenja, in the process of invoking a guardian Spirit, the shape of which is starting to appear behind him.

text:
(Draw a card after you Recruit a Destined card. Once per game per card, a Resilient card does not die in battle resolution.)
Gaitsuru's Earth attachments have Resilient.
title: Tamori Gaitsuru

flavor: "I could see you dead on the battlefield, Scorpion, but I wish to kill you myself."
designernotes: Akodo General in the field of battle, getting ready for a duel against an opposing general.

text: Iaijutsu Battle: Misaka challenges a target enemy Personality. The winner may target and give Reserve to a Personality in a Province, and if the winner was the challenged in the duel and defending, give that Reserve Personality -5GC.
title: Akodo Misaka

flavor: The lands around Kyuden Ikoma were as familiar to him as his own flesh. He frowned at what he saw. "Someone has been here," he whispered.
designernotes: Grizzled, scarred veteran making reconnaissance around Scorpion lands.

text: Battle: Fear equal to the number of attacking units in Morita's army, which may target a Personality with Followers if you control a Terrain.
title: Ikoma Morita

flavor: "I will be with you in a moment. Make your peace now."
designernotes: Matsu slowly drawing his blade, concentrated. Richly decorated armor.

text:
(Duelists win tied duels versus non-Duelists. Battle: Discard a card to give this Tactician a Force bonus equal to the card's Focus Value.)
After Akio uses her rulebook Tactical Advantage ability, give her a Chi bonus equal to half the Focus Value of the card discarded for it, rounded up.
title: Matsu Akio

flavor: "Come, brothers. War is the most glorious thing. There is always more prey."
designernotes: A beastmaster surrounded by vicious looking lions, growling.

text:
(Once per turn, as an Absent Engage, move your unbowed Personality in a Cavalry unit to the battle.)
Battle: Straighten Takeuchi's target Follower. If it is a Cat with higher Force than an opposing bowed Follower or Personality, the Cat may use its abilities an additional time this turn.
title: Matsu Takeuchi

flavor: The Scorpion had grossly underestimated Akodo Dairuko, perhaps thinking her moderate nature made her weak. But the strength of her forces showed she was Lion to her core.
designernotes: Matsu Tayuko and her trident, leading the charge against the Scorpion, an inspiring warrior figure.

text:
While attacking, Tayuko has +2F and +1F for each each Honor action you have resolved (this turn).
Battle: Move home a target enemy defending Personality with lower Personal Honor. If the target has fewer attachments, gain 1 Honor.
title: Matsu Tayuko

flavor: "They are not so different from men. They crave both war and peace. They know love and violence. Perhaps they are more human than we are."
designernotes: Traditional Matsu Beastmaster having fun with her beasts, relaxed.

text: Battle, :bow:: Give Yamamura's target Nonhuman Follower a Force bonus equal to Yamamura's Force or the Force of any bowed enemy Follower or Personality.
title: Matsu Yamamura

flavor: "I see it, sister," Chiyoko replied, "Let us show it the sun."
designernotes:
An elegant Moshi priestess rising into the sky, one army raised above her head, from which a huge burst of light is shining down, blinding her enemies.
Twin sister to Moshi Zap. Rumbler inherited her mother's Fire affinity.

text: Thunder Battle: Fear 2, plus 1 for each Fire or Thunder action you have resolved from a Spell at this battlefield (Bow a target enemy Follower or Personality without Followers with Force equal to or lower than the Fear's strength).
title: Moshi Chiyoko

flavor: "Sister, that thing," Nariko said, "it is from the abyssal depths. It knows only night."
designernotes:
A wild thunder shugenja atop a kobune ship enjoying a raging storm at sea.
Twin sister to Moshi Rumbler. Zap inherited her mother's Air affinity.

text:
(Once a turn, the Attacker gets the first Battle action, if it's from a Naval Personality's unit.)
After Nariko Equips a Spell, give her +1F, and give her +1C if the Spell is Air or Thunder or you are Phoenix Clan.
title: Moshi Nariko

flavor: They called her "Kigakikubachi," for she was always the last to release her arrow.
designernotes: Consult with Denton. Novel main character, so very specific art direction is needed.

text: Compassion: Instead of drawing a card for bringing Kinuyo into play, you may put a card in your Fate discard pile into your hand. (Compassion takes effect while you have fewer Provinces than anyone else.)
story: 2014 THe First Taste of Blood - Steven Givens
title: Tsuruchi Kinuyo

flavor: "'What if they look up?' she asked me. Ha! They never look up."
designernotes: Tsuruchi Taito sits on a branch, smoking a pipe, his hat sitting on top of his bow, which is leaning against the tree trunk. Several of his arrows are stuck into the branch, ready for him to grab them. His quarry walks below the tree, unaware.

text: Battle, :bow:: Ranged 3 Attack. If this destroyed an enemy Personality, move Taito home; this movement is optional if the Defender has taken an action this battle.
title: Tsuruchi Taito

flavor: "There's no reasoning with umikaiju."
designernotes: A Mantis Kensai throwing one of his kama directly into the forehead of an approaching enemy.

text:
Your Peasant Weapons out of play have Honor. (Repeatable Interrupt: Discard an Honor card to give an Honor gain or loss +1 or -1.)
Battle: Target Honjo's Weapon. Bow it, or if it is a Peasant Weapon you may destroy it, to make a Melee 2 Attack.
title: Yoritomo Honjo

flavor: "This isn't supposed to happen," Tamiya whispered. "I didn't choose this! I never accepted anything!"
designernotes: A Mantis Clan samurai sits in a hidden place, unwrapping his bandaged arm and regarding his flesh underneath that is tainted and corrupted, with a grim expression.

text: After Tamiya enters play, lose 2 Honor. Your Peasant Weapons out of play have Courage. (Repeatable Interrupt: Discard a Courage card to give a Fear effect +2 or -2 strength.)
title: Yoritomo Tamiya

flavor: "We sought only to aid the Empire with the gift of knowledge. We received only violence as thanks."
designernotes: Notes: Do you smell what the Rock is cooking up with fire!

text:
After you Recruit Dorai from a Province, refill it face-up.
Void Open: Give Kharmic to a face-up Library or Temple in your Province.
title: Agasha Dorai

flavor: "I will save you, my friend. From yourself, if need be."

text: Your Earth and Jade Spells out of play have Honor and Kharmic while another player controls any Shadowlands Personalities. After an action from an Earth or Jade card in this unit bows or destroys an enemy Shadowlands card, gain 1 Honor.
title: Asako Misai

flavor: Many Phoenix felt anger at the Unicorn's offense. The crisis of the Seals demanded they set it aside, but Bikaru neither forgave nor forgot.
designernotes: Notes: A large scary Shugenja... Rambo style.

text: Enters play for 2 less Gold if you are Crab Clan or have Compassion or Courtesy. (Compassion takes effect while you have fewer Provinces than anyone else. Courtesy does not take effect if you went first.)
title: Isawa Bikaru

flavor: "The site of this tomb is distant, yes, but to suggest the Phoenix cannot make it in time?" She could not continue for laughing.
designernotes: Notes: A little water shugenja breaking steel with his bare hands.

text: Battle: Fear equal to Hokaiko's Force that may target Items and Spells. If Hokaiko has moved this turn, this Fear destroys attachments after it bows them.
title: Isawa Hokaiko

flavor: Wave after wave of undead were crushed in the merciless embrace of earth, but they continued coming in seemingly endless numbers.
designernotes: Isawa Norimichi, fighting a Shadowlands Horde at the First Seal, alongside Crab and Mantis.

text:
Your other Earth Shugenja have +1F.
Earth Jade Battle: Melee 3 Attack, or Melee 5 Attack if the target is Shadowlands.
title: Isawa Norimichi, Elemental Master

flavor: All around him, shugenja fell to the ground, crippled by pain and nausea. "What is this?" Kakei demanded, his sword ready but no enemy in sight.
designernotes: Notes: Kakei commanding other Shiba and hunting down Banished.

text: Void Battle: Ranged Attack equal to the number of Kiho and Spell actions you have resolved this battle, or 2, whichever is greater. You may target and move your Shugenja at any location home or, if he or she would be opposed, to this battlefield.
title: Shiba Kakei

flavor:
"I didn't do anything!" Chiyoda wailed. "It's not my fault!"
"Kill enough Lion," she smirked, "and perhaps I won't care."
designernotes: Art: A crazed Scorpion Kensai taking his anger out on a Lion Samurai. The Scorpion has an unholy glow in his eyes and is gaining power via the Shadowlands taint.

text:
(Kensai may attach two One-Handed Weapons.)
Open, :g*:: Target a Weapon in your discard pile. Destroy one of Chiyoda's Madness tokens to Equip the Weapon to him.
title: Bayushi Chiyoda

flavor: "The Lion must never know," Nitoshi said. "Send Kwanchai's daughter."
designernotes: Art: A female Scorpion ninja deftly avoiding the attacks of multiple Lion Samurai. She is clothed in the standard black garb of a ninja, but her mask and distinctive white and red striped sash mark her as the daughter of Bayushi Kwanchai. One of the Lion attackers is distracted by a spirit from Gaki-do, aiding her defense.

text:
After Kanihime enters play, lose 1 Honor.
Ninja Open: Kanihime has +1F/+1C while opposing another player's target Personality in a battle or duel. You may bow one of the target's attachments if he or she has a Poison token.
title: Bayushi Kanihime

flavor: "His family proudly traces their heritage back to the days of our exile in the Burning Sands. Perhaps too proudly." - Sensei Hisako
designernotes: Art: A screaming Scorpion charging alone into battle, both swords drawn. A group of Lion soldiers await his advance, showing that this tactic is probably not the best choice.

text: Battle: Target an enemy Follower or Personality. Either give it -2F, or Fear 2 targeting it (if legal). You may discard one of Shen-lao's Madness tokens to apply the effect you did not choose.
title: Bayushi Shen-lao

flavor: The nightmarish apparition before her had ended the lives of dozens, but she only sneered. "You are unworthy of fear," she mocked, wrapping the chain around its throat. "Soon, you will elicit nothing but laughter."
designernotes: Art: Shosuro Kayo performing the finishing blow on a Goju ninja. The inhuman corpse seems to be melting away on her blade, but she is unfazed.

text: Ninja Battle, :bow:: Melee 3 Attack. This will not be increased or combined, but may target a Personality with attached Followers and a Poison token.
title: Shosuro Kayo

flavor: Ozu smiled at the Lion's disdain for her Mantis attire. They feared Scorpion venom so much that they had clutched a serpent to their breast instead…
designernotes: Art: A Scorpion Ninja infiltrating a library under cover of darkness, disguised as a Mantis. It is clear that he is cutting it close, as there are patrols of guards in the distance.

text:
(Duelists win tied duels versus non-Duelists. Draw a card after your Expendable card dies.)
After Ozu enters play, lose 4 Honor, or 2 Honor if you are Mantis Clan.
title: Shosuro Ozu

flavor: "To suggest that we would allow a breach is beyond insulting. It was the Lion thirst for blood that incensed the creatures. You brought this upon yourselves with your war-mongering!"
designernotes: Art: A regal Scorpion shugenja leading a group of less dignified men into a village. He is pointing at a group of Ashigaru, his next targets for investigation.

text: Battle: Fear 2. If you have resolved an Honor action this turn, this Fear has +2 strength and may target a dishonorable Personality with Followers.
title: Yogo Mizoguchi

flavor: "You chose to stand against us," he hissed. "You threw your lives away for nothing. The will of the Spider will not be denied."
designernotes: Notes: A man it the heat of battle... But there is something very heroic about him.

text:
(Duelists win tied duels versus non-Duelists.)
Battle: Give a target enemy Follower or Personality -3F. If it now has lower Force than Aimaro, give Aimaro +1C (this turn).
title: Daigotsu Aimaro

flavor: The Phoenix magic tore through his form, seemingly without effect. "Not good enough," he whispered.
designernotes: Daigotsu Endo, one of the Spider focus characters

text:
You may Recruit Endo from the discard pile even if he is dead. Endo is not destroyed for having 0 Chi. Your Honor cards out of play have Courage.
Battle: Fear 2, or Fear 4 if the target is Shadowlands.
title: Daigotsu Endo

flavor: The Hiruma screamed as his hand was severed, then stopped forever. Silent as always, Yuhmi had returned to the ranks of the Spider Clan.
designernotes: Notes: This is actually Daigotsu Yuhmi who is leading the forces at the First Seal.

text:
After Yuhmi enters play, lose 4 Honor.
Battle: Fear 4 that destroys Shugenja after it bows them.
title: Daigotsu Yuhmi

flavor: "The less the clans know of the prophecy, the easier our task will be. See to it." - Daigotsu Kanpeki
designernotes: Notes: The comeback guy for Spider.

text:
After Iaitsu enters play, lose 2 Honor.
Ninja Battle, :bow:: Ranged 3 Attack. Straighten Iaitsu if this destroyed a card without abilities (Destroy a target enemy Follower or Personality without Followers with 3 or lower Force).
title: Goju Iaitsu

flavor: "You are terrified, of course. It's only natural. But I feel wonderful! Identity agrees with me, I think."
designernotes: Notes: A masked ninja playing mind-games with an enemy.

text:
(A Conqueror's unit doesn't bow after battle.)
After Toriken enters play, lose 1 Honor.
Ninja Open: Remove an ability from a target non-Unique Follower or Personality.
title: Goju Toriken

flavor: "Hmph," Kanpeki grunted. "I missed watching them work. It is good to have all my father's allies back with us."
designernotes: Notes: A big Spider Ogre... tearing everything in front of him to shreds.

text:
Hikayo's Weapons must be Heavy Weapons. Shadowlands Personalities may not refuse challenges from Hikayo.
Interrupt: Hikayo's duel stat in duels from the action is his printed Force.
title: Hikayo

flavor: "Our hatred is one and the same," Ikikashi whispered into the churning sea. "Your master is dead, but I can offer you more than he ever did..."
designernotes: [Art Note: The Oni who took Tsuruchi Kinuyo's eye. should look Akuma but is not Akuma itself, and may now use Kiunyo's eye, but check with Spooky]

text:
After Akuma enters play, lose 4 Honor. Will not attach cards.
Battle: Destroy a target enemy attachment with equal or lower Force.
title: Akuma no Obake

flavor: A peasant shugenja is unheard of. Any commoner born with the gift is sought and fostered by the Phoenix. It is dangerous to leave such rare incidents as they are. Dangerous in many ways...
designernotes: [Art Note: An Ashigaru with a surprising talent for being able to cast a limited number of Spells.]

text:
(Once per game per card, a Resilient card does not die in battle resolution.)
Keisho will not attach Spells with Focus Value greater than her Chi.
title: Keisho

flavor: "The Spider have betrayed the very ideals they claimed to venerate. It was always about petty revenge. They are not worthy of my fealty. They are not worthy of their lives."
designernotes: [Art Note: This is actually Tetsuo (not Masatane) parleying with Renyu, letting him know the Order of the Spider are no longer with the Spider, and offering him to take him to the Seal to prove himself. You should see Tetsuo's Nagamaki.]

text:
Will not join a Spider Clan player.
Battle, :bow:: Melee 4 Attack. You may bow Tetsuo's Polearm to straighten him.
title: Tetsuo

flavor: "Where are you, Little Bear?" the monstrosity roared. "You took my fingers, now I will take your life!"
designernotes: [Art Note: The Oni from Way of the Crab, missing its fingers]

text:
After The Crimson Mountain Oni enters play, lose 7 Honor. Will not attach cards or issue challenges.
Interrupt: Negate The Crimson Mountain Oni's movement from the action.
Battle: Melee 6 Attack. If this destroys an attachment on a Crab Clan Personality, you may make a Melee 6 Attack.
title: The Crimson Mountain Oni

flavor: Massive beasts rose from the abyssal seas, horrifying and unstoppable.
designernotes: [Art Note: A Water Kaiju Oni, set free from the Sea of Shadows when the first seal is broken. Target: Mantis Isles.

text:
(Once a turn, the Attacker gets the first Battle action, if it's from a Naval Personality's unit.)
After Umikaiju enters play, lose 2 Honor. Will not attach cards.
Battle, :bow:: Fear 5.
title: Umikaiju

flavor: Word of the battle began to reach the clans, bringing even the most heated conflicts to a halt. The fire in Chinua's heart could not be quenched so easily. "There will be a reckoning," he promised.
designernotes: Art: Moto Chinua charging once again on his magnificent steed, but this time he is having his way with some Phoenix troops that are trying to oppose him. He is brutally hacking at them with his scimitar, showing no fear as he charges into their line.

text:
Your Honor cards out of play have Courage.
Battle: Target an enemy card. If it has more Force, is Nonhuman, is Phoenix Clan, or has no attachments, bow it.
title: Moto Chinua

flavor: "Not even the kami can protect you from my blessings."
designernotes: Art: A full face painted death priest using his magic on a Phoenix Samurai. The Samurai is locked in a frozen position, as the magical energy of the Lords of Death drains his stamina.

text:
(Once a turn, the Attacker gets the first Battle action, if it's from a Naval Personality's unit.)
Battle, :bow:: Fear equal to Dai-ketsu's Force plus the number of Spells he has. If there is a dead Personality in any discard pile or you are Mantis Clan, straighten Dai-ketsu.
title: Moto Dai-ketsu

flavor: Politics and war ride together. Men fall to the needs of both.

text:
(Once per game per card, a Resilient card does not die in battle resolution.)
Jengzan's Cavalry Followers have Resilient. Your Cavalry Followers out of play have Honor. (Repeatable Interrupt: Discard an Honor card to give an Honor gain or loss +1 or -1.)
title: Moto Jengzan

flavor: "I may not carry Benten's blessings, but I am righteous, and that is enough."
designernotes: Art: A stout Shinjo Magistrate with an immaculate mustache walking down the crowded streets of a city. He is incredibly confident and full of himself, and the surrounding citizens are giving him plenty of room to pass by.

text:
Home Interrupt: After a Personality is rehonored for the action's effects (including Honor gain), gain 1 Honor.
Battle: Give a target enemy Personality -2F. Dishonor the target if he or she has lower Personal Honor than Dogenda.
title: Shinjo Dogenda

flavor: "I will be merciful if you confess. Do so quickly, or freeze. I care little which you choose."
designernotes: Art: A Shinjo Magistrate looking over a group of her captives from atop her horse, questioning them about their crimes. She obviously does not believe what they are telling her and is frustrated by their insincerity.

text: (Once per turn, as an Absent Engage, move your unbowed Personality in a Cavalry unit to the battle. Draw a card after you Recruit a Destined card.)
title: Shinjo Megura

flavor: "Honor guides my steed, and my arrows."
designernotes: Art: A battle maiden galloping on her mount while taking aim with a bow. She has perfect concentration and is not disturbed by the motion of the horse at all.

text:
Tireless Battle: Straighten Yabusame if she is attacking and your Family Honor is higher than any other player's.
Repeatable Battle, :bow:: Ranged 3 Attack. Gain 1 Honor.
title: Utaku Yabusame

flavor: "For fallen family."
designernotes: This is actually Hida Yakamo.

text:
Cannot gain Corruption tokens or Shadowlands. After Yakamo enters play, you may create and Equip to him (paying all costs) a +2C/4GC Hand • Jade Item with the traits, "Cannot be transferred or destroyed. Has +2F while opposing an Obsidian card, a Shadowlands card, or an army with more units."
Jade Battle: Melee 4 Attack.
title: Hida Yakamo, Seven Thunder

flavor: "For she who holds my heart."
designernotes: This is actually Doji Hoturi

text:
Cannot gain Corruption tokens or Shadowlands. Favor actions may not target Hoturi. Add Hoturi's PH to the FV of his first focused card per duel. After Hoturi is destroyed, gain Honor equal to his Personal Honor.
Iaijutsu Battle: Hoturi challenges a target enemy Personality. Destroy the loser. If the loser did not focus from his or her hand, the winner draws a card.
title: Doji Hoturi, Seven Thunder

flavor: "For revenge."
designernotes: This is actually Mirumoto Hitomi

text:
Cannot gain Corruption tokens or Shadowlands. After Hitomi enters play, you may create and Equip to her (paying all costs) a +2F/4GC Hand • Obsidian Item with the traits, "Cannot be transferred or destroyed. Hitomi has Shugenja. Has +2C while opposing a Jade card or a Personality with higher Personal Honor."
Unstoppable Engage: Target one to three cards in the hand of a player with a unit at this battlefield. He or she shuffles them into their deck and draws that many cards.
title: Mirumoto Hitomi, Seven Thunder

flavor: "For my plans."
designernotes: This is actually Togashi Yokuni

text:
Cannot gain Corruption tokens or Shadowlands. Yokuni and your Seven Thunder cards in and out of play cannot be controlled by other players and lose Loyal.
Open, :g4:: If it is your turn, even if Yokuni is face-up in your Province, look at the top card of your Fate deck. You may put it at the bottom. Draw a card.
Battle: Melee 4 Attack.
title: Togashi Yokuni, Kami

flavor: "For Rokugan."
designernotes: This is actually Akodo Toturi as Ronin and the Lion Thunder.

text:
Cannot gain Corruption tokens or Shadowlands. Can only be controlled by his owner. Lion Clan players may Proclaim Toturi. Other players' Fear effects targeting cards in Toturi's army have -1 strength.
Tireless Battle: Toturi unites the Lion Clan. Another target Personality's printed abilities may be used an additional time this turn. Straighten them or take an additional action.
title: Toturi, Seven Thunder

flavor: "For greatness."
designernotes: This is actually Yoritomo.

text:
Yoritomo can only be controlled by his owner and has +1F/+1C for each of his Weapons. Followers and other Mantis Clan Personalities in Yoritomo's army have +1F while opposing a Shadowlands card.
Battle, : Draw a card. Discard a card unless you (now) have fewer cards in your hand or fewer Provinces than any other player.
title: Yoritomo, Son of Storms

flavor: "For a brighter future."
designernotes: This is actually Isawa Tadaka.

text:
Tadaka need not bow for your Kiho or Spell actions.
Interrupt: Negate an action from another Shugenja or Spell.
Earth Jade Unstoppable Battle: Tadaka casts Jade Strike. Bow a target card. Destroy it if it is Shadowlands or has no attachments.
title: Isawa Tadaka, Seven Thunder

flavor: "For redemption."
designernotes: This is actually Bayushi Kachiko.

text:
Cannot gain Corruption tokens or Shadowlands.
Dynasty/Open, :bow:: Kachiko may remain bowed. Target a Personality. While Kachiko remains bowed, after each time the target assigns, the target's controller's turn begins, and your turn begins if the target is Shadowlands, give the target a -1F/-1C Poison token. Remove these tokens if Kachiko straightens or leaves play.
title: Bayushi Kachiko, Seven Thunder

flavor: "For destiny."

text:
Cannot gain Corruption tokens or Shadowlands. Can only be controlled by his owner. Need not bow for your Kiho actions.
Open, :bow:, :gstar:: Give Destined to a target face-up Personality in a Province and ignore their Honor Requirement. If they are a Seven Thunder, you may Recruit them. One or more target players may each straighten a Ring they control.

text:
Cannot gain Corruption tokens or Shadowlands. Kamoko's Followers must be Cavalry. After Kamoko enters play, create and attach to her a 1F Cavalry Follower with the trait, "After Kamoko's Battle action targets Yogo Junzo, destroy him."
Battle: If they would be opposed, move a target Personality at any location to the current battlefield. If Kamoko is attacking, you may target and destroy a card without attachments in the Personality's unit.
